00052 static void lfsck_key_fini(const struct lu_context *ctx,
00053                            struct lu_context_key *key, void *data)
00054 {
00055         struct lfsck_thread_info *info = data;
00056 
00057         lu_buf_free(&info->lti_linkea_buf);
00058         lu_buf_free(&info->lti_linkea_buf2);
00059         lu_buf_free(&info->lti_big_buf);
00060         OBD_FREE_PTR(info);
00061 }

00097 static inline void
00098 lfsck_reset_ltd_status(struct lfsck_tgt_desc *ltd, enum lfsck_type type)
00099 {
00100         if (type == LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT) {
00101                 ltd->ltd_layout_status = LS_MAX;
00102                 ltd->ltd_layout_repaired = 0;
00103         } else {
00104                 ltd->ltd_namespace_status = LS_MAX;
00105                 ltd->ltd_namespace_repaired = 0;
00106         }
00107 }
00108 
00109 static int lfsck_tgt_descs_init(struct lfsck_tgt_descs *ltds)
00110 {
00111         spin_lock_init(&ltds->ltd_lock);
00112         init_rwsem(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
00113         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ltds->ltd_orphan);
00114         ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap = CFS_ALLOCATE_BITMAP(BITS_PER_LONG);
00115         if (ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap == NULL)
00116                 return -ENOMEM;
00117 
00118         return 0;
00119 }
00120 
00121 static void lfsck_tgt_descs_fini(struct lfsck_tgt_descs *ltds)
00122 {
00123         struct lfsck_tgt_desc   *ltd;
00124         struct lfsck_tgt_desc   *next;
00125         int                      idx;
00126 
00127         down_write(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
00128 
00129         list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next, &ltds->ltd_orphan,
00130                                  ltd_orphan_list) {
00131                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_orphan_list);
00132                 lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
00133         }
00134 
00135         if (unlikely(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap == NULL)) {
00136                 up_write(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
00137 
00138                 return;
00139         }
00140 
00141         cfs_foreach_bit(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap, idx) {
00142                 ltd = lfsck_ltd2tgt(ltds, idx);
00143                 if (likely(ltd != NULL)) {
00144                         LASSERT(list_empty(&ltd->ltd_layout_list));
00145                         LASSERT(list_empty(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list));
00146                         LASSERT(list_empty(&ltd->ltd_namespace_list));
00147                         LASSERT(list_empty(&ltd->ltd_namespace_phase_list));
00148 
00149                         ltds->ltd_tgtnr--;
00150                         cfs_bitmap_clear(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap, idx);
00151                         lfsck_assign_tgt(ltds, NULL, idx);
00152                         lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
00153                 }
00154         }
00155 
00156         LASSERTF(ltds->ltd_tgtnr == 0, "tgt count unmatched: %d\n",
00157                  ltds->ltd_tgtnr);
00158 
00159         for (idx = 0; idx < TGT_PTRS; idx++) {
00160                 if (ltds->ltd_tgts_idx[idx] != NULL) {
00161                         OBD_FREE_PTR(ltds->ltd_tgts_idx[idx]);
00162                         ltds->ltd_tgts_idx[idx] = NULL;
00163                 }
00164         }
00165 
00166         CFS_FREE_BITMAP(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap);
00167         ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap = NULL;
00168         up_write(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
00169 }
00170 
00171 static int __lfsck_add_target(const struct lu_env *env,
00172                               struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
00173                               struct lfsck_tgt_desc *ltd,
00174                               bool for_ost, bool locked)
00175 {
00176         struct lfsck_tgt_descs *ltds;
00177         __u32                   index = ltd->ltd_index;
00178         int                     rc    = 0;
00179         ENTRY;
00180 
00181         if (for_ost)
00182                 ltds = &lfsck->li_ost_descs;
00183         else
00184                 ltds = &lfsck->li_mdt_descs;
00185 
00186         if (!locked)
00187                 down_write(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
00188 
00189         LASSERT(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap != NULL);
00190 
00191         if (index >= ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap->size) {
00192                 __u32 newsize = max((__u32)ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap->size,
00193                                     (__u32)BITS_PER_LONG);
00194                 struct cfs_bitmap *old_bitmap = ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap;
00195                 struct cfs_bitmap *new_bitmap;
00196 
00197                 while (newsize < index + 1)
00198                         newsize <<= 1;
00199 
00200                 new_bitmap = CFS_ALLOCATE_BITMAP(newsize);
00201                 if (new_bitmap == NULL)
00202                         GOTO(unlock, rc = -ENOMEM);
00203 
00204                 if (ltds->ltd_tgtnr > 0)
00205                         cfs_bitmap_copy(new_bitmap, old_bitmap);
00206                 ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap = new_bitmap;
00207                 CFS_FREE_BITMAP(old_bitmap);
00208         }
00209 
00210         if (cfs_bitmap_check(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap, index)) {
00211                 CERROR("%s: the device %s (%u) is registered already\n",
00212                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
00213                        ltd->ltd_tgt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd->obd_name, index);
00214                 GOTO(unlock, rc = -EEXIST);
00215         }
00216 
00217         if (ltds->ltd_tgts_idx[index / TGT_PTRS_PER_BLOCK] == NULL) {
00218                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(ltds->ltd_tgts_idx[index / TGT_PTRS_PER_BLOCK]);
00219                 if (ltds->ltd_tgts_idx[index / TGT_PTRS_PER_BLOCK] == NULL)
00220                         GOTO(unlock, rc = -ENOMEM);
00221         }
00222 
00223         lfsck_assign_tgt(ltds, ltd, index);
00224         cfs_bitmap_set(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap, index);
00225         ltds->ltd_tgtnr++;
00226 
00227         GOTO(unlock, rc = 0);
00228 
00229 unlock:
00230         if (!locked)
00231                 up_write(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
00232 
00233         return rc;
00234 }
00235 
00236 static int lfsck_add_target_from_orphan(const struct lu_env *env,
00237                                         struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
00238 {
00239         struct lfsck_tgt_descs  *ltds    = &lfsck->li_ost_descs;
00240         struct lfsck_tgt_desc   *ltd;
00241         struct lfsck_tgt_desc   *next;
00242         struct list_head        *head    = &lfsck_ost_orphan_list;
00243         int                      rc;
00244         bool                     for_ost = true;
00245 
00246 again:
00247         spin_lock(&lfsck_instance_lock);
00248         list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next, head, ltd_orphan_list) {
00249                 if (ltd->ltd_key == lfsck->li_bottom)
00250                         list_move_tail(&ltd->ltd_orphan_list,
00251                                        &ltds->ltd_orphan);
00252         }
00253         spin_unlock(&lfsck_instance_lock);
00254 
00255         down_write(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
00256         while (!list_empty(&ltds->ltd_orphan)) {
00257                 ltd = list_entry(ltds->ltd_orphan.next,
00258                                  struct lfsck_tgt_desc,
00259                                  ltd_orphan_list);
00260                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_orphan_list);
00261                 rc = __lfsck_add_target(env, lfsck, ltd, for_ost, true);
00262                 /* Do not hold the semaphore for too long time. */
00263                 up_write(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
00264                 if (rc != 0)
00265                         return rc;
00266 
00267                 down_write(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
00268         }
00269         up_write(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
00270 
00271         if (for_ost) {
00272                 ltds = &lfsck->li_mdt_descs;
00273                 head = &lfsck_mdt_orphan_list;
00274                 for_ost = false;
00275                 goto again;
00276         }
00277 
00278         return 0;
00279 }

00281 static inline struct lfsck_component *
00282 __lfsck_component_find(struct lfsck_instance *lfsck, __u16 type,
00283                        struct list_head *list)
00284 {
00285         struct lfsck_component *com;
00286 
00287         list_for_each_entry(com, list, lc_link) {
00288                 if (com->lc_type == type)
00289                         return com;
00290         }
00291         return NULL;
00292 }
00293 
00294 struct lfsck_component *
00295 lfsck_component_find(struct lfsck_instance *lfsck, __u16 type)
00296 {
00297         struct lfsck_component *com;
00298 
00299         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00300         com = __lfsck_component_find(lfsck, type, &lfsck->li_list_scan);
00301         if (com != NULL)
00302                 goto unlock;
00303 
00304         com = __lfsck_component_find(lfsck, type,
00305                                      &lfsck->li_list_double_scan);
00306         if (com != NULL)
00307                 goto unlock;
00308 
00309         com = __lfsck_component_find(lfsck, type, &lfsck->li_list_idle);
00310 
00311 unlock:
00312         if (com != NULL)
00313                 lfsck_component_get(com);
00314         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
00315         return com;
00316 }
00317 
00318 void lfsck_component_cleanup(const struct lu_env *env,
00319                              struct lfsck_component *com)
00320 {
00321         if (!list_empty(&com->lc_link))
00322                 list_del_init(&com->lc_link);
00323         if (!list_empty(&com->lc_link_dir))
00324                 list_del_init(&com->lc_link_dir);
00325 
00326         lfsck_component_put(env, com);
00327 }
00328 
00329 int lfsck_fid_alloc(const struct lu_env *env, struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
00330                     struct lu_fid *fid, bool locked)
00331 {
00332         struct lfsck_bookmark   *bk = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
00333         int                      rc = 0;
00334         ENTRY;
00335 
00336         if (!locked)
00337                 mutex_lock(&lfsck->li_mutex);
00338 
00339         rc = seq_client_alloc_fid(env, lfsck->li_seq, fid);
00340         if (rc >= 0) {
00341                 bk->lb_last_fid = *fid;
00342                 /* We do not care about whether the subsequent sub-operations
00343                  * failed or not. The worst case is that one FID is lost that
00344                  * is not a big issue for the LFSCK since it is relative rare
00345                  * for LFSCK create. */
00346                 rc = lfsck_bookmark_store(env, lfsck);
00347         }
00348 
00349         if (!locked)
00350                 mutex_unlock(&lfsck->li_mutex);
00351 
00352         RETURN(rc);
00353 }
00354 
00355 static int __lfsck_ibits_lock(const struct lu_env *env,
00356                               struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
00357                               struct dt_object *obj, struct ldlm_res_id *resid,
00358                               struct lustre_handle *lh, __u64 bits,
00359                               enum ldlm_mode mode)
00360 {
00361         struct lfsck_thread_info        *info   = lfsck_env_info(env);
00362         union ldlm_policy_data          *policy = &info->lti_policy;
00363         __u64                            flags  = LDLM_FL_ATOMIC_CB;
00364         int                              rc;
00365 
00366         LASSERT(lfsck->li_namespace != NULL);
00367 
00368         memset(policy, 0, sizeof(*policy));
00369         policy->l_inodebits.bits = bits;
00370         if (dt_object_remote(obj)) {
00371                 struct ldlm_enqueue_info *einfo = &info->lti_einfo;
00372 
00373                 memset(einfo, 0, sizeof(*einfo));
00374                 einfo->ei_type = LDLM_IBITS;
00375                 einfo->ei_mode = mode;
00376                 einfo->ei_cb_bl = ldlm_blocking_ast;
00377                 einfo->ei_cb_cp = ldlm_completion_ast;
00378                 einfo->ei_res_id = resid;
00379 
00380                 rc = dt_object_lock(env, obj, lh, einfo, policy);
00381         } else {
00382                 rc = ldlm_cli_enqueue_local(lfsck->li_namespace, resid,
00383                                             LDLM_IBITS, policy, mode,
00384                                             &flags, ldlm_blocking_ast,
00385                                             ldlm_completion_ast, NULL, NULL,
00386                                             0, LVB_T_NONE, NULL, lh);
00387         }
00388 
00389         if (rc == ELDLM_OK) {
00390                 rc = 0;
00391         } else {
00392                 memset(lh, 0, sizeof(*lh));
00393                 rc = -EIO;
00394         }
00395 
00396         return rc;
00397 }
00398 
00415 int lfsck_ibits_lock(const struct lu_env *env, struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
00416                      struct dt_object *obj, struct lustre_handle *lh,
00417                      __u64 bits, enum ldlm_mode mode)
00418 {
00419         struct ldlm_res_id *resid = &lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_resid;
00420 
00421         LASSERT(!lustre_handle_is_used(lh));
00422 
00423         fid_build_reg_res_name(lfsck_dto2fid(obj), resid);
00424         return __lfsck_ibits_lock(env, lfsck, obj, resid, lh, bits, mode);
00425 }
00426 
00436 void lfsck_ibits_unlock(struct lustre_handle *lh, enum ldlm_mode mode)
00437 {
00438         if (lustre_handle_is_used(lh)) {
00439                 ldlm_lock_decref(lh, mode);
00440                 memset(lh, 0, sizeof(*lh));
00441         }
00442 }
00443 
00468 int lfsck_lock(const struct lu_env *env, struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
00469                struct dt_object *obj, const char *name,
00470                struct lfsck_lock_handle *llh, __u64 bits, enum ldlm_mode mode)
00471 {
00472         struct ldlm_res_id *resid = &lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_resid;
00473         int                 rc;
00474 
00475         LASSERT(S_ISDIR(lfsck_object_type(obj)));
00476         LASSERT(name != NULL);
00477         LASSERT(name[0] != 0);
00478         LASSERT(!lustre_handle_is_used(&llh->llh_pdo_lh));
00479         LASSERT(!lustre_handle_is_used(&llh->llh_reg_lh));
00480 
00481         switch (mode) {
00482         case LCK_EX:
00483                 llh->llh_pdo_mode = LCK_EX;
00484                 break;
00485         case LCK_PW:
00486                 llh->llh_pdo_mode = LCK_CW;
00487                 break;
00488         case LCK_PR:
00489                 llh->llh_pdo_mode = LCK_CR;
00490                 break;
00491         default:
00492                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: unexpected PDO lock mode %u on the obj "
00493                        DFID"\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), mode,
00494                        PFID(lfsck_dto2fid(obj)));
00495                 LBUG();
00496         }
00497 
00498         fid_build_reg_res_name(lfsck_dto2fid(obj), resid);
00499         rc = __lfsck_ibits_lock(env, lfsck, obj, resid, &llh->llh_pdo_lh,
00500                                 MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE, llh->llh_pdo_mode);
00501         if (rc != 0)
00502                 return rc;
00503 
00504         llh->llh_reg_mode = mode;
00505         resid->name[LUSTRE_RES_ID_HSH_OFF] = full_name_hash(name, strlen(name));
00506         LASSERT(resid->name[LUSTRE_RES_ID_HSH_OFF] != 0);
00507         rc = __lfsck_ibits_lock(env, lfsck, obj, resid, &llh->llh_reg_lh,
00508                                 bits, llh->llh_reg_mode);
00509         if (rc != 0)
00510                 lfsck_ibits_unlock(&llh->llh_pdo_lh, llh->llh_pdo_mode);
00511 
00512         return rc;
00513 }
00514 
00520 void lfsck_unlock(struct lfsck_lock_handle *llh)
00521 {
00522         lfsck_ibits_unlock(&llh->llh_reg_lh, llh->llh_reg_mode);
00523         lfsck_ibits_unlock(&llh->llh_pdo_lh, llh->llh_pdo_mode);
00524 }

00526 int lfsck_find_mdt_idx_by_fid(const struct lu_env *env,
00527                               struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
00528                               const struct lu_fid *fid)
00529 {
00530         struct seq_server_site  *ss     = lfsck_dev_site(lfsck);
00531         struct lu_seq_range     *range  = &lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_range;
00532         int                      rc;
00533 
00534         fld_range_set_mdt(range);
00535         rc = fld_server_lookup(env, ss->ss_server_fld, fid_seq(fid), range);
00536         if (rc == 0)
00537                 rc = range->lsr_index;
00538 
00539         return rc;
00540 }

00542 const char dot[] = ".";
00543 const char dotdot[] = "..";
00544 static const char dotlustre[] = ".lustre";
00545 static const char lostfound[] = "lost+found";
00546 
00561 static int lfsck_lpf_remove_name_entry(const struct lu_env *env,
00562                                        struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
00563                                        const char *name)
00564 {
00565         struct dt_object        *parent = lfsck->li_lpf_root_obj;
00566         struct dt_device        *dev    = lfsck_obj2dev(parent);
00567         struct thandle          *th;
00568         struct lfsck_lock_handle *llh   = &lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_llh;
00569         int                      rc;
00570         ENTRY;
00571 
00572         rc = lfsck_lock(env, lfsck, parent, name, llh,
00573                         MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE, LCK_PW);
00574         if (rc != 0)
00575                 RETURN(rc);
00576 
00577         th = dt_trans_create(env, dev);
00578         if (IS_ERR(th))
00579                 GOTO(unlock, rc = PTR_ERR(th));
00580 
00581         rc = dt_declare_delete(env, parent, (const struct dt_key *)name, th);
00582         if (rc != 0)
00583                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00584 
00585         rc = dt_declare_ref_del(env, parent, th);
00586         if (rc != 0)
00587                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00588 
00589         rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, dev, th);
00590         if (rc != 0)
00591                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00592 
00593         rc = dt_delete(env, parent, (const struct dt_key *)name, th);
00594         if (rc != 0)
00595                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00596 
00597         dt_write_lock(env, parent, 0);
00598         rc = dt_ref_del(env, parent, th);
00599         dt_write_unlock(env, parent);
00600 
00601         GOTO(stop, rc);
00602 
00603 stop:
00604         dt_trans_stop(env, dev, th);
00605 
00606 unlock:
00607         lfsck_unlock(llh);
00608 
00609         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: remove name entry "DFID"/%s: rc = %d\n",
00610                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), PFID(lfsck_dto2fid(parent)), name, rc);
00611 
00612         return rc;
00613 }
00614 
00615 static int lfsck_create_lpf_local(const struct lu_env *env,
00616                                   struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
00617                                   struct dt_object *child,
00618                                   struct lu_attr *la,
00619                                   struct dt_object_format *dof,
00620                                   const char *name)
00621 {
00622         struct dt_insert_rec    *rec    = &lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_dt_rec;
00623         struct dt_object        *parent = lfsck->li_lpf_root_obj;
00624         struct dt_device        *dev    = lfsck_obj2dev(child);
00625         struct lfsck_bookmark   *bk     = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
00626         struct dt_object        *bk_obj = lfsck->li_bookmark_obj;
00627         const struct lu_fid     *cfid   = lfsck_dto2fid(child);
00628         struct thandle          *th     = NULL;
00629         struct linkea_data       ldata  = { NULL };
00630         struct lu_buf            linkea_buf;
00631         const struct lu_name    *cname;
00632         loff_t                   pos    = 0;
00633         int                      len    = sizeof(struct lfsck_bookmark);
00634         int                      rc;
00635         ENTRY;
00636 
00637         rc = linkea_data_new(&ldata,
00638                              &lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_linkea_buf2);
00639         if (rc != 0)
00640                 RETURN(rc);
00641 
00642         cname = lfsck_name_get_const(env, name, strlen(name));
00643         rc = linkea_add_buf(&ldata, cname, lfsck_dto2fid(parent));
00644         if (rc != 0)
00645                 RETURN(rc);
00646 
00647         th = dt_trans_create(env, dev);
00648         if (IS_ERR(th))
00649                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(th));
00650 
00651         /* 1a. create child */
00652         rc = dt_declare_create(env, child, la, NULL, dof, th);
00653         if (rc != 0)
00654                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00655 
00656         if (!dt_try_as_dir(env, child))
00657                 GOTO(stop, rc = -ENOTDIR);
00658 
00659         /* 2a. increase child nlink */
00660         rc = dt_declare_ref_add(env, child, th);
00661         if (rc != 0)
00662                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00663 
00664         /* 3a. insert dot into child dir */
00665         rec->rec_type = S_IFDIR;
00666         rec->rec_fid = cfid;
00667         rc = dt_declare_insert(env, child, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00668                                (const struct dt_key *)dot, th);
00669         if (rc != 0)
00670                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00671 
00672         /* 4a. insert dotdot into child dir */
00673         rec->rec_fid = &LU_LPF_FID;
00674         rc = dt_declare_insert(env, child, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00675                                (const struct dt_key *)dotdot, th);
00676         if (rc != 0)
00677                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00678 
00679         /* 5a. insert linkEA for child */
00680         lfsck_buf_init(&linkea_buf, ldata.ld_buf->lb_buf,
00681                        ldata.ld_leh->leh_len);
00682         rc = dt_declare_xattr_set(env, child, &linkea_buf,
00683                                   XATTR_NAME_LINK, 0, th);
00684         if (rc != 0)
00685                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00686 
00687         /* 6a. insert name into parent dir */
00688         rec->rec_type = S_IFDIR;
00689         rec->rec_fid = cfid;
00690         rc = dt_declare_insert(env, parent, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00691                                (const struct dt_key *)name, th);
00692         if (rc != 0)
00693                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00694 
00695         /* 7a. increase parent nlink */
00696         rc = dt_declare_ref_add(env, parent, th);
00697         if (rc != 0)
00698                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00699 
00700         /* 8a. update bookmark */
00701         rc = dt_declare_record_write(env, bk_obj,
00702                                      lfsck_buf_get(env, bk, len), 0, th);
00703         if (rc != 0)
00704                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00705 
00706         rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, dev, th);
00707         if (rc != 0)
00708                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00709 
00710         dt_write_lock(env, child, 0);
00711         /* 1b. create child */
00712         rc = dt_create(env, child, la, NULL, dof, th);
00713         if (rc != 0)
00714                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00715 
00716         /* 2b. increase child nlink */
00717         rc = dt_ref_add(env, child, th);
00718         if (rc != 0)
00719                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00720 
00721         /* 3b. insert dot into child dir */
00722         rec->rec_fid = cfid;
00723         rc = dt_insert(env, child, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00724                        (const struct dt_key *)dot, th, 1);
00725         if (rc != 0)
00726                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00727 
00728         /* 4b. insert dotdot into child dir */
00729         rec->rec_fid = &LU_LPF_FID;
00730         rc = dt_insert(env, child, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00731                        (const struct dt_key *)dotdot, th, 1);
00732         if (rc != 0)
00733                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00734 
00735         /* 5b. insert linkEA for child. */
00736         rc = dt_xattr_set(env, child, &linkea_buf,
00737                           XATTR_NAME_LINK, 0, th);
00738         dt_write_unlock(env, child);
00739         if (rc != 0)
00740                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00741 
00742         /* 6b. insert name into parent dir */
00743         rec->rec_fid = cfid;
00744         rc = dt_insert(env, parent, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00745                        (const struct dt_key *)name, th, 1);
00746         if (rc != 0)
00747                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00748 
00749         dt_write_lock(env, parent, 0);
00750         /* 7b. increase parent nlink */
00751         rc = dt_ref_add(env, parent, th);
00752         dt_write_unlock(env, parent);
00753         if (rc != 0)
00754                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00755 
00756         bk->lb_lpf_fid = *cfid;
00757         lfsck_bookmark_cpu_to_le(&lfsck->li_bookmark_disk, bk);
00758 
00759         /* 8b. update bookmark */
00760         rc = dt_record_write(env, bk_obj,
00761                              lfsck_buf_get(env, bk, len), &pos, th);
00762 
00763         GOTO(stop, rc);
00764 
00765 unlock:
00766         dt_write_unlock(env, child);
00767 
00768 stop:
00769         dt_trans_stop(env, dev, th);
00770 
00771         return rc;
00772 }
00773 
00774 static int lfsck_create_lpf_remote(const struct lu_env *env,
00775                                    struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
00776                                    struct dt_object *child,
00777                                    struct lu_attr *la,
00778                                    struct dt_object_format *dof,
00779                                    const char *name)
00780 {
00781         struct dt_insert_rec    *rec    = &lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_dt_rec;
00782         struct dt_object        *parent = lfsck->li_lpf_root_obj;
00783         struct lfsck_bookmark   *bk     = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
00784         struct dt_object        *bk_obj = lfsck->li_bookmark_obj;
00785         const struct lu_fid     *cfid   = lfsck_dto2fid(child);
00786         struct thandle          *th     = NULL;
00787         struct linkea_data       ldata  = { NULL };
00788         struct lu_buf            linkea_buf;
00789         const struct lu_name    *cname;
00790         struct dt_device        *dev;
00791         loff_t                   pos    = 0;
00792         int                      len    = sizeof(struct lfsck_bookmark);
00793         int                      rc;
00794         ENTRY;
00795 
00796         rc = linkea_data_new(&ldata,
00797                              &lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_linkea_buf2);
00798         if (rc != 0)
00799                 RETURN(rc);
00800 
00801         cname = lfsck_name_get_const(env, name, strlen(name));
00802         rc = linkea_add_buf(&ldata, cname, lfsck_dto2fid(parent));
00803         if (rc != 0)
00804                 RETURN(rc);
00805 
00806         /* Create .lustre/lost+found/MDTxxxx. */
00807 
00808         /* XXX: Currently, cross-MDT create operation needs to create the child
00809          *      object firstly, then insert name into the parent directory. For
00810          *      this case, the child object resides on current MDT (local), but
00811          *      the parent ".lustre/lost+found" may be on remote MDT. It is not
00812          *      easy to contain all the sub-modifications orderly within single
00813          *      transaction.
00814          *
00815          *      To avoid more inconsistency, we split the create operation into
00816          *      two transactions:
00817          *
00818          *      1) create the child and update the lfsck_bookmark::lb_lpf_fid
00819          *         locally.
00820          *      2) insert the name "MDTXXXX" in the parent ".lustre/lost+found"
00821          *         remotely.
00822          *
00823          *      If 1) done, but 2) failed, then go ahead, the LFSCK will try to
00824          *      repair such inconsistency when LFSCK run next time. */
00825 
00826         /* Transaction I: locally */
00827 
00828         dev = lfsck_obj2dev(child);
00829         th = dt_trans_create(env, dev);
00830         if (IS_ERR(th))
00831                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(th));
00832 
00833         /* 1a. create child */
00834         rc = dt_declare_create(env, child, la, NULL, dof, th);
00835         if (rc != 0)
00836                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00837 
00838         if (!dt_try_as_dir(env, child))
00839                 GOTO(stop, rc = -ENOTDIR);
00840 
00841         /* 2a. increase child nlink */
00842         rc = dt_declare_ref_add(env, child, th);
00843         if (rc != 0)
00844                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00845 
00846         /* 3a. insert dot into child dir */
00847         rec->rec_type = S_IFDIR;
00848         rec->rec_fid = cfid;
00849         rc = dt_declare_insert(env, child, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00850                                (const struct dt_key *)dot, th);
00851         if (rc != 0)
00852                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00853 
00854         /* 4a. insert dotdot into child dir */
00855         rec->rec_fid = &LU_LPF_FID;
00856         rc = dt_declare_insert(env, child, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00857                                (const struct dt_key *)dotdot, th);
00858         if (rc != 0)
00859                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00860 
00861         /* 5a. insert linkEA for child */
00862         lfsck_buf_init(&linkea_buf, ldata.ld_buf->lb_buf,
00863                        ldata.ld_leh->leh_len);
00864         rc = dt_declare_xattr_set(env, child, &linkea_buf,
00865                                   XATTR_NAME_LINK, 0, th);
00866         if (rc != 0)
00867                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00868 
00869         /* 6a. update bookmark */
00870         rc = dt_declare_record_write(env, bk_obj,
00871                                      lfsck_buf_get(env, bk, len), 0, th);
00872         if (rc != 0)
00873                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00874 
00875         rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, dev, th);
00876         if (rc != 0)
00877                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00878 
00879         dt_write_lock(env, child, 0);
00880         /* 1b. create child */
00881         rc = dt_create(env, child, la, NULL, dof, th);
00882         if (rc != 0)
00883                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00884 
00885         /* 2b. increase child nlink */
00886         rc = dt_ref_add(env, child, th);
00887         if (rc != 0)
00888                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00889 
00890         /* 3b. insert dot into child dir */
00891         rec->rec_type = S_IFDIR;
00892         rec->rec_fid = cfid;
00893         rc = dt_insert(env, child, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00894                        (const struct dt_key *)dot, th, 1);
00895         if (rc != 0)
00896                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00897 
00898         /* 4b. insert dotdot into child dir */
00899         rec->rec_fid = &LU_LPF_FID;
00900         rc = dt_insert(env, child, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00901                        (const struct dt_key *)dotdot, th, 1);
00902         if (rc != 0)
00903                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00904 
00905         /* 5b. insert linkEA for child */
00906         rc = dt_xattr_set(env, child, &linkea_buf,
00907                           XATTR_NAME_LINK, 0, th);
00908         if (rc != 0)
00909                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00910 
00911         bk->lb_lpf_fid = *cfid;
00912         lfsck_bookmark_cpu_to_le(&lfsck->li_bookmark_disk, bk);
00913 
00914         /* 6b. update bookmark */
00915         rc = dt_record_write(env, bk_obj,
00916                              lfsck_buf_get(env, bk, len), &pos, th);
00917 
00918         dt_write_unlock(env, child);
00919         dt_trans_stop(env, dev, th);
00920         if (rc != 0)
00921                 RETURN(rc);
00922 
00923         /* Transaction II: remotely */
00924 
00925         dev = lfsck_obj2dev(parent);
00926         th = dt_trans_create(env, dev);
00927         if (IS_ERR(th))
00928                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(th));
00929 
00930         th->th_sync = 1;
00931         /* 5a. insert name into parent dir */
00932         rec->rec_fid = cfid;
00933         rc = dt_declare_insert(env, parent, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00934                                (const struct dt_key *)name, th);
00935         if (rc != 0)
00936                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00937 
00938         /* 6a. increase parent nlink */
00939         rc = dt_declare_ref_add(env, parent, th);
00940         if (rc != 0)
00941                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00942 
00943         rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, dev, th);
00944         if (rc != 0)
00945                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00946 
00947         /* 5b. insert name into parent dir */
00948         rc = dt_insert(env, parent, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00949                        (const struct dt_key *)name, th, 1);
00950         if (rc != 0)
00951                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00952 
00953         dt_write_lock(env, parent, 0);
00954         /* 6b. increase parent nlink */
00955         rc = dt_ref_add(env, parent, th);
00956         dt_write_unlock(env, parent);
00957 
00958         GOTO(stop, rc);
00959 
00960 unlock:
00961         dt_write_unlock(env, child);
00962 stop:
00963         dt_trans_stop(env, dev, th);
00964 
00965         if (rc != 0 && dev == lfsck_obj2dev(parent))
00966                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: partially created the object "DFID
00967                        "for orphans, but failed to insert the name %s "
00968                        "to the .lustre/lost+found/. Such inconsistency "
00969                        "will be repaired when LFSCK run next time: rc = %d\n",
00970                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), PFID(cfid), name, rc);
00971 
00972         return rc;
00973 }
00974 
00989 static int lfsck_create_lpf(const struct lu_env *env,
00990                             struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
00991 {
00992         struct lfsck_bookmark    *bk    = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
00993         struct lfsck_thread_info *info  = lfsck_env_info(env);
00994         struct lu_fid            *cfid  = &info->lti_fid2;
00995         struct lu_attr           *la    = &info->lti_la;
00996         struct dt_object_format  *dof   = &info->lti_dof;
00997         struct dt_object         *parent = lfsck->li_lpf_root_obj;
00998         struct dt_object         *child = NULL;
00999         struct lfsck_lock_handle *llh   = &info->lti_llh;
01000         char                      name[8];
01001         int                       node  = lfsck_dev_idx(lfsck);
01002         int                       rc    = 0;
01003         ENTRY;
01004 
01005         LASSERT(lfsck->li_master);
01006         LASSERT(parent != NULL);
01007         LASSERT(lfsck->li_lpf_obj == NULL);
01008 
01009         snprintf(name, 8, "MDT%04x", node);
01010         rc = lfsck_lock(env, lfsck, parent, name, llh,
01011                         MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE, LCK_PW);
01012         if (rc != 0)
01013                 RETURN(rc);
01014 
01015         if (fid_is_zero(&bk->lb_lpf_fid)) {
01016                 /* There is corner case that: in former LFSCK scanning we have
01017                  * created the .lustre/lost+found/MDTxxxx but failed to update
01018                  * the lfsck_bookmark::lb_lpf_fid successfully. So need lookup
01019                  * it from MDT0 firstly. */
01020                 rc = dt_lookup(env, parent, (struct dt_rec *)cfid,
01021                                (const struct dt_key *)name);
01022                 if (rc != 0 && rc != -ENOENT)
01023                         GOTO(unlock, rc);
01024 
01025                 if (rc == 0) {
01026                         bk->lb_lpf_fid = *cfid;
01027                         rc = lfsck_bookmark_store(env, lfsck);
01028                 } else {
01029                         rc = lfsck_fid_alloc(env, lfsck, cfid, true);
01030                 }
01031                 if (rc != 0)
01032                         GOTO(unlock, rc);
01033         } else {
01034                 *cfid = bk->lb_lpf_fid;
01035         }
01036 
01037         child = lfsck_object_find_bottom(env, lfsck, cfid);
01038         if (IS_ERR(child))
01039                 GOTO(unlock, rc = PTR_ERR(child));
01040 
01041         if (dt_object_exists(child) != 0) {
01042                 if (unlikely(!dt_try_as_dir(env, child)))
01043                         rc = -ENOTDIR;
01044                 else
01045                         lfsck->li_lpf_obj = child;
01046 
01047                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
01048         }
01049 
01050         memset(la, 0, sizeof(*la));
01051         la->la_atime = la->la_mtime = la->la_ctime = cfs_time_current_sec();
01052         la->la_mode = S_IFDIR | S_IRWXU;
01053         la->la_valid = LA_ATIME | LA_MTIME | LA_CTIME | LA_MODE |
01054                        LA_UID | LA_GID;
01055         memset(dof, 0, sizeof(*dof));
01056         dof->dof_type = dt_mode_to_dft(S_IFDIR);
01057 
01058         if (node == 0)
01059                 rc = lfsck_create_lpf_local(env, lfsck, child, la, dof, name);
01060         else
01061                 rc = lfsck_create_lpf_remote(env, lfsck, child, la, dof, name);
01062         if (rc == 0)
01063                 lfsck->li_lpf_obj = child;
01064 
01065         GOTO(unlock, rc);
01066 
01067 unlock:
01068         lfsck_unlock(llh);
01069         if (rc != 0 && child != NULL && !IS_ERR(child))
01070                 lfsck_object_put(env, child);
01071 
01072         return rc;
01073 }
01074 
01088 static int lfsck_scan_lpf_bad_entries(const struct lu_env *env,
01089                                       struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
01090 {
01091         struct dt_object        *parent = lfsck->li_lpf_root_obj;
01092         struct lu_dirent        *ent    =
01093                         (struct lu_dirent *)lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_key;
01094         const struct dt_it_ops  *iops   = &parent->do_index_ops->dio_it;
01095         struct dt_it            *it;
01096         int                      rc;
01097         ENTRY;
01098 
01099         it = iops->init(env, parent, LUDA_64BITHASH);
01100         if (IS_ERR(it))
01101                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(it));
01102 
01103         rc = iops->load(env, it, 0);
01104         if (rc == 0)
01105                 rc = iops->next(env, it);
01106         else if (rc > 0)
01107                 rc = 0;
01108 
01109         while (rc == 0) {
01110                 int off = 3;
01111 
01112                 rc = iops->rec(env, it, (struct dt_rec *)ent, LUDA_64BITHASH);
01113                 if (rc != 0)
01114                         break;
01115 
01116                 ent->lde_namelen = le16_to_cpu(ent->lde_namelen);
01117                 if (name_is_dot_or_dotdot(ent->lde_name, ent->lde_namelen))
01118                         goto next;
01119 
01120                 /* name length must be strlen("MDTxxxx") */
01121                 if (ent->lde_namelen != 7)
01122                         goto remove;
01123 
01124                 if (memcmp(ent->lde_name, "MDT", off) != 0)
01125                         goto remove;
01126 
01127                 while (off < 7 && isxdigit(ent->lde_name[off]))
01128                         off++;
01129 
01130                 if (off != 7) {
01131 
01132 remove:
01133                         rc = lfsck_lpf_remove_name_entry(env, lfsck,
01134                                                          ent->lde_name);
01135                         if (rc != 0)
01136                                 break;
01137                 }
01138 
01139 next:
01140                 rc = iops->next(env, it);
01141         }
01142 
01143         iops->put(env, it);
01144         iops->fini(env, it);
01145 
01146         RETURN(rc > 0 ? 0 : rc);
01147 }
01148 
01149 static int lfsck_update_lpf_entry(const struct lu_env *env,
01150                                   struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
01151                                   struct dt_object *parent,
01152                                   struct dt_object *child,
01153                                   const char *name,
01154                                   enum lfsck_verify_lpf_types type)
01155 {
01156         int rc;
01157 
01158         if (type == LVLT_BY_BOOKMARK) {
01159                 rc = lfsck_update_name_entry(env, lfsck, parent, name,
01160                                              lfsck_dto2fid(child), S_IFDIR);
01161         } else /* if (type == LVLT_BY_NAMEENTRY) */ {
01162                 lfsck->li_bookmark_ram.lb_lpf_fid = *lfsck_dto2fid(child);
01163                 rc = lfsck_bookmark_store(env, lfsck);
01164 
01165                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: update LPF fid "DFID
01166                        " in the bookmark file: rc = %d\n",
01167                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
01168                        PFID(lfsck_dto2fid(child)), rc);
01169         }
01170 
01171         return rc;
01172 }
01173 
01213 static int lfsck_verify_lpf_pairs(const struct lu_env *env,
01214                                   struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
01215                                   struct dt_object *child, const char *name,
01216                                   struct lu_fid *fid,
01217                                   enum lfsck_verify_lpf_types type)
01218 {
01219         struct dt_object         *parent  = lfsck->li_lpf_root_obj;
01220         struct lfsck_thread_info *info    = lfsck_env_info(env);
01221         char                     *name2   = info->lti_key;
01222         struct lu_fid            *fid2    = &info->lti_fid3;
01223         struct dt_object         *parent2 = NULL;
01224         struct lustre_handle      lh      = { 0 };
01225         int                       rc;
01226         ENTRY;
01227 
01228         fid_zero(fid);
01229         rc = dt_lookup(env, child, (struct dt_rec *)fid,
01230                        (const struct dt_key *)dotdot);
01231         if (rc != 0)
01232                 GOTO(linkea, rc);
01233 
01234         if (!fid_is_sane(fid))
01235                 GOTO(linkea, rc = -EINVAL);
01236 
01237         if (lu_fid_eq(fid, &LU_LPF_FID)) {
01238                 const struct lu_name *cname;
01239 
01240                 if (lfsck->li_lpf_obj == NULL) {
01241                         lu_object_get(&child->do_lu);
01242                         lfsck->li_lpf_obj = child;
01243                 }
01244 
01245                 cname = lfsck_name_get_const(env, name, strlen(name));
01246                 rc = lfsck_verify_linkea(env, child, cname, &LU_LPF_FID);
01247                 if (rc == 0)
01248                         rc = lfsck_update_lpf_entry(env, lfsck, parent, child,
01249                                                     name, type);
01250 
01251                 GOTO(out_done, rc);
01252         }
01253 
01254         parent2 = lfsck_object_find_bottom(env, lfsck, fid);
01255         if (IS_ERR(parent2))
01256                 GOTO(linkea, parent2);
01257 
01258         if (!dt_object_exists(parent2)) {
01259                 lfsck_object_put(env, parent2);
01260 
01261                 GOTO(linkea, parent2 = ERR_PTR(-ENOENT));
01262         }
01263 
01264         if (!dt_try_as_dir(env, parent2)) {
01265                 lfsck_object_put(env, parent2);
01266 
01267                 GOTO(linkea, parent2 = ERR_PTR(-ENOTDIR));
01268         }
01269 
01270 linkea:
01271         /* To prevent rename/unlink race */
01272         rc = lfsck_ibits_lock(env, lfsck, child, &lh,
01273                               MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE, LCK_PR);
01274         if (rc != 0)
01275                 GOTO(out_put, rc);
01276 
01277         dt_read_lock(env, child, 0);
01278         rc = lfsck_links_get_first(env, child, name2, fid2);
01279         if (rc != 0) {
01280                 dt_read_unlock(env, child);
01281                 lfsck_ibits_unlock(&lh, LCK_PR);
01282 
01283                 GOTO(out_put, rc = 1);
01284         }
01285 
01286         /* It is almost impossible that the bookmark file (or the name entry)
01287          * and the linkEA hit the same data corruption. Trust the linkEA. */
01288         if (lu_fid_eq(fid2, &LU_LPF_FID) && strcmp(name, name2) == 0) {
01289                 dt_read_unlock(env, child);
01290                 lfsck_ibits_unlock(&lh, LCK_PR);
01291 
01292                 *fid = *fid2;
01293                 if (lfsck->li_lpf_obj == NULL) {
01294                         lu_object_get(&child->do_lu);
01295                         lfsck->li_lpf_obj = child;
01296                 }
01297 
01298                 /* Update the child's dotdot entry */
01299                 rc = lfsck_update_name_entry(env, lfsck, child, dotdot,
01300                                              &LU_LPF_FID, S_IFDIR);
01301                 if (rc == 0)
01302                         rc = lfsck_update_lpf_entry(env, lfsck, parent, child,
01303                                                     name, type);
01304 
01305                 GOTO(out_put, rc);
01306         }
01307 
01308         if (parent2 == NULL || IS_ERR(parent2)) {
01309                 dt_read_unlock(env, child);
01310                 lfsck_ibits_unlock(&lh, LCK_PR);
01311 
01312                 GOTO(out_done, rc = 1);
01313         }
01314 
01315         rc = dt_lookup(env, parent2, (struct dt_rec *)fid,
01316                        (const struct dt_key *)name2);
01317         dt_read_unlock(env, child);
01318         lfsck_ibits_unlock(&lh, LCK_PR);
01319         if (rc != 0 && rc != -ENOENT)
01320                 GOTO(out_put, rc);
01321 
01322         if (rc == -ENOENT || !lu_fid_eq(fid, lfsck_dto2fid(child))) {
01323                 if (type == LVLT_BY_BOOKMARK)
01324                         GOTO(out_put, rc = 1);
01325 
01326                 /* Trust the name entry, update the child's dotdot entry. */
01327                 rc = lfsck_update_name_entry(env, lfsck, child, dotdot,
01328                                              &LU_LPF_FID, S_IFDIR);
01329 
01330                 GOTO(out_put, rc);
01331         }
01332 
01333         if (type == LVLT_BY_BOOKMARK) {
01334                 /* Invalid FID record in the bookmark file, reset it. */
01335                 fid_zero(&lfsck->li_bookmark_ram.lb_lpf_fid);
01336                 rc = lfsck_bookmark_store(env, lfsck);
01337 
01338                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: reset invalid LPF fid "DFID
01339                        " in the bookmark file: rc = %d\n",
01340                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), PFID(lfsck_dto2fid(child)), rc);
01341         } else /* if (type == LVLT_BY_NAMEENTRY) */ {
01342                 /* The name entry is wrong, remove it. */
01343                 rc = lfsck_lpf_remove_name_entry(env, lfsck, name);
01344         }
01345 
01346         GOTO(out_put, rc);
01347 
01348 out_put:
01349         if (parent2 != NULL && !IS_ERR(parent2))
01350                 lfsck_object_put(env, parent2);
01351 
01352 out_done:
01353         return rc;
01354 }
01355 
01371 int lfsck_verify_lpf(const struct lu_env *env, struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
01372 {
01373         struct lfsck_thread_info *info   = lfsck_env_info(env);
01374         struct lu_fid            *pfid   = &info->lti_fid;
01375         struct lu_fid            *cfid   = &info->lti_fid2;
01376         struct lfsck_bookmark    *bk     = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
01377         struct dt_object         *parent;
01378         /* child1's FID is in the bookmark file. */
01379         struct dt_object         *child1 = NULL;
01380         /* child2's FID is in the name entry MDTxxxx. */
01381         struct dt_object         *child2 = NULL;
01382         const struct lu_name     *cname;
01383         char                      name[8];
01384         int                       node   = lfsck_dev_idx(lfsck);
01385         int                       rc     = 0;
01386         ENTRY;
01387 
01388         LASSERT(lfsck->li_master);
01389 
01390         if (lfsck->li_lpf_root_obj != NULL)
01391                 RETURN(0);
01392 
01393         if (node == 0) {
01394                 parent = lfsck_object_find_by_dev(env, lfsck->li_bottom,
01395                                                   &LU_LPF_FID);
01396         } else {
01397                 struct lfsck_tgt_desc *ltd;
01398 
01399                 ltd = lfsck_tgt_get(&lfsck->li_mdt_descs, 0);
01400                 if (unlikely(ltd == NULL))
01401                         RETURN(-ENXIO);
01402 
01403                 parent = lfsck_object_find_by_dev(env, ltd->ltd_tgt,
01404                                                   &LU_LPF_FID);
01405                 lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
01406         }
01407 
01408         if (IS_ERR(parent))
01409                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(parent));
01410 
01411         LASSERT(dt_object_exists(parent));
01412 
01413         if (unlikely(!dt_try_as_dir(env, parent))) {
01414                 lfsck_object_put(env, parent);
01415 
01416                 GOTO(put, rc = -ENOTDIR);
01417         }
01418 
01419         lfsck->li_lpf_root_obj = parent;
01420         if (node == 0) {
01421                 rc = lfsck_scan_lpf_bad_entries(env, lfsck);
01422                 if (rc != 0)
01423                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: scan .lustre/lost+found/ "
01424                                "for bad sub-directories: rc = %d\n",
01425                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), rc);
01426         }
01427 
01428         /* child2 */
01429         snprintf(name, 8, "MDT%04x", node);
01430         rc = dt_lookup(env, parent, (struct dt_rec *)cfid,
01431                        (const struct dt_key *)name);
01432         if (rc == -ENOENT) {
01433                 rc = 0;
01434                 goto find_child1;
01435         }
01436 
01437         if (rc != 0)
01438                 GOTO(put, rc);
01439 
01440         /* Invalid FID in the name entry, remove the name entry. */
01441         if (!fid_is_norm(cfid)) {
01442                 rc = lfsck_lpf_remove_name_entry(env, lfsck, name);
01443                 if (rc != 0)
01444                         GOTO(put, rc);
01445 
01446                 goto find_child1;
01447         }
01448 
01449         child2 = lfsck_object_find_bottom(env, lfsck, cfid);
01450         if (IS_ERR(child2))
01451                 GOTO(put, rc = PTR_ERR(child2));
01452 
01453         if (unlikely(!dt_object_exists(child2) ||
01454                      dt_object_remote(child2)) ||
01455                      !S_ISDIR(lfsck_object_type(child2))) {
01456                 rc = lfsck_lpf_remove_name_entry(env, lfsck, name);
01457                 if (rc != 0)
01458                         GOTO(put, rc);
01459 
01460                 goto find_child1;
01461         }
01462 
01463         if (unlikely(!dt_try_as_dir(env, child2))) {
01464                 lfsck_object_put(env, child2);
01465                 child2 = NULL;
01466                 rc = -ENOTDIR;
01467         }
01468 
01469 find_child1:
01470         if (fid_is_zero(&bk->lb_lpf_fid))
01471                 goto check_child2;
01472 
01473         if (likely(lu_fid_eq(cfid, &bk->lb_lpf_fid))) {
01474                 if (lfsck->li_lpf_obj == NULL) {
01475                         lu_object_get(&child2->do_lu);
01476                         lfsck->li_lpf_obj = child2;
01477                 }
01478 
01479                 cname = lfsck_name_get_const(env, name, strlen(name));
01480                 rc = lfsck_verify_linkea(env, child2, cname, &LU_LPF_FID);
01481 
01482                 GOTO(put, rc);
01483         }
01484 
01485         if (unlikely(!fid_is_norm(&bk->lb_lpf_fid))) {
01486                 struct lu_fid tfid = bk->lb_lpf_fid;
01487 
01488                 /* Invalid FID record in the bookmark file, reset it. */
01489                 fid_zero(&bk->lb_lpf_fid);
01490                 rc = lfsck_bookmark_store(env, lfsck);
01491 
01492                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: reset invalid LPF fid "DFID
01493                        " in the bookmark file: rc = %d\n",
01494                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), PFID(&tfid), rc);
01495 
01496                 if (rc != 0)
01497                         GOTO(put, rc);
01498 
01499                 goto check_child2;
01500         }
01501 
01502         child1 = lfsck_object_find_bottom(env, lfsck, &bk->lb_lpf_fid);
01503         if (IS_ERR(child1)) {
01504                 child1 = NULL;
01505                 goto check_child2;
01506         }
01507 
01508         if (unlikely(!dt_object_exists(child1) ||
01509                      dt_object_remote(child1)) ||
01510                      !S_ISDIR(lfsck_object_type(child1))) {
01511                 /* Invalid FID record in the bookmark file, reset it. */
01512                 fid_zero(&bk->lb_lpf_fid);
01513                 rc = lfsck_bookmark_store(env, lfsck);
01514 
01515                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: reset invalid LPF fid "DFID
01516                        " in the bookmark file: rc = %d\n",
01517                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
01518                        PFID(lfsck_dto2fid(child1)), rc);
01519 
01520                 if (rc != 0)
01521                         GOTO(put, rc);
01522 
01523                 lfsck_object_put(env, child1);
01524                 child1 = NULL;
01525                 goto check_child2;
01526         }
01527 
01528         if (unlikely(!dt_try_as_dir(env, child1))) {
01529                 lfsck_object_put(env, child1);
01530                 child1 = NULL;
01531                 rc = -ENOTDIR;
01532                 goto check_child2;
01533         }
01534 
01535         rc = lfsck_verify_lpf_pairs(env, lfsck, child1, name, pfid,
01536                                     LVLT_BY_BOOKMARK);
01537         if (lu_fid_eq(pfid, &LU_LPF_FID))
01538                 GOTO(put, rc);
01539 
01540 check_child2:
01541         if (child2 != NULL)
01542                 rc = lfsck_verify_lpf_pairs(env, lfsck, child2, name,
01543                                             pfid, LVLT_BY_NAMEENTRY);
01544 
01545         GOTO(put, rc);
01546 
01547 put:
01548         if (lfsck->li_lpf_obj != NULL) {
01549                 if (unlikely(!dt_try_as_dir(env, lfsck->li_lpf_obj))) {
01550                         lfsck_object_put(env, lfsck->li_lpf_obj);
01551                         lfsck->li_lpf_obj = NULL;
01552                         rc = -ENOTDIR;
01553                 }
01554         } else if (rc == 0) {
01555                 rc = lfsck_create_lpf(env, lfsck);
01556         }
01557 
01558         if (child2 != NULL && !IS_ERR(child2))
01559                 lfsck_object_put(env, child2);
01560         if (child1 != NULL && !IS_ERR(child1))
01561                 lfsck_object_put(env, child1);
01562 
01563         return rc;
01564 }
01565 
01566 static int lfsck_fid_init(struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
01567 {
01568         struct lfsck_bookmark   *bk     = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
01569         struct seq_server_site  *ss     = lfsck_dev_site(lfsck);
01570         char                    *prefix;
01571         int                      rc     = 0;
01572         ENTRY;
01573 
01574         if (unlikely(ss == NULL))
01575                 RETURN(-ENXIO);
01576 
01577         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(lfsck->li_seq);
01578         if (lfsck->li_seq == NULL)
01579                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
01580 
01581         OBD_ALLOC(prefix, MAX_OBD_NAME + 7);
01582         if (prefix == NULL)
01583                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
01584 
01585         snprintf(prefix, MAX_OBD_NAME + 7, "lfsck-%s", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck));
01586         rc = seq_client_init(lfsck->li_seq, NULL, LUSTRE_SEQ_METADATA, prefix,
01587                              ss->ss_server_seq);
01588         OBD_FREE(prefix, MAX_OBD_NAME + 7);
01589         if (rc != 0)
01590                 GOTO(out, rc);
01591 
01592         if (fid_is_sane(&bk->lb_last_fid))
01593                 lfsck->li_seq->lcs_fid = bk->lb_last_fid;
01594 
01595         RETURN(0);
01596 
01597 out:
01598         OBD_FREE_PTR(lfsck->li_seq);
01599         lfsck->li_seq = NULL;
01600 
01601         return rc;
01602 }
01603 
01604 static void lfsck_fid_fini(struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
01605 {
01606         if (lfsck->li_seq != NULL) {
01607                 seq_client_fini(lfsck->li_seq);
01608                 OBD_FREE_PTR(lfsck->li_seq);
01609                 lfsck->li_seq = NULL;
01610         }
01611 }
01612 
01613 void lfsck_instance_cleanup(const struct lu_env *env,
01614                             struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
01615 {
01616         struct ptlrpc_thread    *thread = &lfsck->li_thread;
01617         struct lfsck_component  *com;
01618         struct lfsck_component  *next;
01619         struct lfsck_lmv_unit   *llu;
01620         struct lfsck_lmv_unit   *llu_next;
01621         struct lfsck_lmv        *llmv;
01622         ENTRY;
01623 
01624         LASSERT(list_empty(&lfsck->li_link));
01625         LASSERT(thread_is_init(thread) || thread_is_stopped(thread));
01626 
01627         if (lfsck->li_obj_oit != NULL) {
01628                 lfsck_object_put(env, lfsck->li_obj_oit);
01629                 lfsck->li_obj_oit = NULL;
01630         }
01631 
01632         LASSERT(lfsck->li_obj_dir == NULL);
01633         LASSERT(lfsck->li_lmv == NULL);
01634 
01635         list_for_each_entry_safe(llu, llu_next, &lfsck->li_list_lmv, llu_link) {
01636                 llmv = &llu->llu_lmv;
01637 
01638                 LASSERTF(atomic_read(&llmv->ll_ref) == 1,
01639                          "still in using: %u\n",
01640                          atomic_read(&llmv->ll_ref));
01641 
01642                 lfsck_lmv_put(env, llmv);
01643         }
01644 
01645         list_for_each_entry_safe(com, next, &lfsck->li_list_scan, lc_link) {
01646                 lfsck_component_cleanup(env, com);
01647         }
01648 
01649         LASSERT(list_empty(&lfsck->li_list_dir));
01650 
01651         list_for_each_entry_safe(com, next, &lfsck->li_list_double_scan,
01652                                  lc_link) {
01653                 lfsck_component_cleanup(env, com);
01654         }
01655 
01656         list_for_each_entry_safe(com, next, &lfsck->li_list_idle, lc_link) {
01657                 lfsck_component_cleanup(env, com);
01658         }
01659 
01660         lfsck_tgt_descs_fini(&lfsck->li_ost_descs);
01661         lfsck_tgt_descs_fini(&lfsck->li_mdt_descs);
01662 
01663         if (lfsck->li_lfsck_dir != NULL) {
01664                 lfsck_object_put(env, lfsck->li_lfsck_dir);
01665                 lfsck->li_lfsck_dir = NULL;
01666         }
01667 
01668         if (lfsck->li_bookmark_obj != NULL) {
01669                 lfsck_object_put(env, lfsck->li_bookmark_obj);
01670                 lfsck->li_bookmark_obj = NULL;
01671         }
01672 
01673         if (lfsck->li_lpf_obj != NULL) {
01674                 lfsck_object_put(env, lfsck->li_lpf_obj);
01675                 lfsck->li_lpf_obj = NULL;
01676         }
01677 
01678         if (lfsck->li_lpf_root_obj != NULL) {
01679                 lfsck_object_put(env, lfsck->li_lpf_root_obj);
01680                 lfsck->li_lpf_root_obj = NULL;
01681         }
01682 
01683         if (lfsck->li_los != NULL) {
01684                 local_oid_storage_fini(env, lfsck->li_los);
01685                 lfsck->li_los = NULL;
01686         }
01687 
01688         lfsck_fid_fini(lfsck);
01689 
01690         OBD_FREE_PTR(lfsck);
01691 }
01692 
01693 static inline struct lfsck_instance *
01694 __lfsck_instance_find(struct dt_device *key, bool ref, bool unlink)
01695 {
01696         struct lfsck_instance *lfsck;
01697 
01698         list_for_each_entry(lfsck, &lfsck_instance_list, li_link) {
01699                 if (lfsck->li_bottom == key) {
01700                         if (ref)
01701                                 lfsck_instance_get(lfsck);
01702                         if (unlink)
01703                                 list_del_init(&lfsck->li_link);
01704 
01705                         return lfsck;
01706                 }
01707         }
01708 
01709         return NULL;
01710 }
01711 
01712 struct lfsck_instance *lfsck_instance_find(struct dt_device *key, bool ref,
01713                                            bool unlink)
01714 {
01715         struct lfsck_instance *lfsck;
01716 
01717         spin_lock(&lfsck_instance_lock);
01718         lfsck = __lfsck_instance_find(key, ref, unlink);
01719         spin_unlock(&lfsck_instance_lock);
01720 
01721         return lfsck;
01722 }
01723 
01724 static inline int lfsck_instance_add(struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
01725 {
01726         struct lfsck_instance *tmp;
01727 
01728         spin_lock(&lfsck_instance_lock);
01729         list_for_each_entry(tmp, &lfsck_instance_list, li_link) {
01730                 if (lfsck->li_bottom == tmp->li_bottom) {
01731                         spin_unlock(&lfsck_instance_lock);
01732                         return -EEXIST;
01733                 }
01734         }
01735 
01736         list_add_tail(&lfsck->li_link, &lfsck_instance_list);
01737         spin_unlock(&lfsck_instance_lock);
01738         return 0;
01739 }
01740 
01741 void lfsck_bits_dump(struct seq_file *m, int bits, const char *names[],
01742                      const char *prefix)
01743 {
01744         int flag;
01745         int i;
01746         bool newline = (bits != 0 ? false : true);
01747 
01748         seq_printf(m, "%s:%c", prefix, bits != 0 ? ' ' : '\n');
01749 
01750         for (i = 0, flag = 1; bits != 0; i++, flag = 1 << i) {
01751                 if (flag & bits) {
01752                         bits &= ~flag;
01753                         if (names[i] != NULL) {
01754                                 if (bits == 0)
01755                                         newline = true;
01756 
01757                                 seq_printf(m, "%s%c", names[i],
01758                                            newline ? '\n' : ',');
01759                         }
01760                 }
01761         }
01762 
01763         if (!newline)
01764                 seq_putc(m, '\n');
01765 }
01766 
01767 void lfsck_time_dump(struct seq_file *m, __u64 time, const char *name)
01768 {
01769         if (time == 0) {
01770                 seq_printf(m, "%s_time: N/A\n", name);
01771                 seq_printf(m, "time_since_%s: N/A\n", name);
01772         } else {
01773                 seq_printf(m, "%s_time: "LPU64"\n", name, time);
01774                 seq_printf(m, "time_since_%s: "LPU64" seconds\n",
01775                            name, cfs_time_current_sec() - time);
01776         }
01777 }
01778 
01779 void lfsck_pos_dump(struct seq_file *m, struct lfsck_position *pos,
01780                     const char *prefix)
01781 {
01782         if (fid_is_zero(&pos->lp_dir_parent)) {
01783                 if (pos->lp_oit_cookie == 0) {
01784                         seq_printf(m, "%s: N/A, N/A, N/A\n", prefix);
01785                         return;
01786                 }
01787                 seq_printf(m, "%s: "LPU64", N/A, N/A\n",
01788                            prefix, pos->lp_oit_cookie);
01789         } else {
01790                 seq_printf(m, "%s: "LPU64", "DFID", "LPX64"\n",
01791                            prefix, pos->lp_oit_cookie,
01792                            PFID(&pos->lp_dir_parent), pos->lp_dir_cookie);
01793         }
01794 }
01795 
01796 void lfsck_pos_fill(const struct lu_env *env, struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
01797                     struct lfsck_position *pos, bool init)
01798 {
01799         const struct dt_it_ops *iops = &lfsck->li_obj_oit->do_index_ops->dio_it;
01800 
01801         if (unlikely(lfsck->li_di_oit == NULL)) {
01802                 memset(pos, 0, sizeof(*pos));
01803                 return;
01804         }
01805 
01806         pos->lp_oit_cookie = iops->store(env, lfsck->li_di_oit);
01807         if (!lfsck->li_current_oit_processed && !init)
01808                 pos->lp_oit_cookie--;
01809 
01810         LASSERT(pos->lp_oit_cookie > 0);
01811 
01812         if (lfsck->li_di_dir != NULL) {
01813                 struct dt_object *dto = lfsck->li_obj_dir;
01814 
01815                 pos->lp_dir_cookie = dto->do_index_ops->dio_it.store(env,
01816                                                         lfsck->li_di_dir);
01817 
01818                 if (pos->lp_dir_cookie >= MDS_DIR_END_OFF) {
01819                         fid_zero(&pos->lp_dir_parent);
01820                         pos->lp_dir_cookie = 0;
01821                 } else {
01822                         pos->lp_dir_parent = *lfsck_dto2fid(dto);
01823                 }
01824         } else {
01825                 fid_zero(&pos->lp_dir_parent);
01826                 pos->lp_dir_cookie = 0;
01827         }
01828 }
01829 
01830 bool __lfsck_set_speed(struct lfsck_instance *lfsck, __u32 limit)
01831 {
01832         bool dirty = false;
01833 
01834         if (limit != LFSCK_SPEED_NO_LIMIT) {
01835                 if (limit > msecs_to_jiffies(MSEC_PER_SEC)) {
01836                         lfsck->li_sleep_rate = limit /
01837                                                msecs_to_jiffies(MSEC_PER_SEC);
01838                         lfsck->li_sleep_jif = 1;
01839                 } else {
01840                         lfsck->li_sleep_rate = 1;
01841                         lfsck->li_sleep_jif = msecs_to_jiffies(MSEC_PER_SEC) /
01842                                               limit;
01843                 }
01844         } else {
01845                 lfsck->li_sleep_jif = 0;
01846                 lfsck->li_sleep_rate = 0;
01847         }
01848 
01849         if (lfsck->li_bookmark_ram.lb_speed_limit != limit) {
01850                 lfsck->li_bookmark_ram.lb_speed_limit = limit;
01851                 dirty = true;
01852         }
01853 
01854         return dirty;
01855 }
01856 
01857 void lfsck_control_speed(struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
01858 {
01859         struct ptlrpc_thread *thread = &lfsck->li_thread;
01860         struct l_wait_info    lwi;
01861 
01862         if (lfsck->li_sleep_jif > 0 &&
01863             lfsck->li_new_scanned >= lfsck->li_sleep_rate) {
01864                 lwi = LWI_TIMEOUT_INTR(lfsck->li_sleep_jif, NULL,
01865                                        LWI_ON_SIGNAL_NOOP, NULL);
01866 
01867                 l_wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq,
01868                              !thread_is_running(thread),
01869                              &lwi);
01870                 lfsck->li_new_scanned = 0;
01871         }
01872 }
01873 
01874 void lfsck_control_speed_by_self(struct lfsck_component *com)
01875 {
01876         struct lfsck_instance   *lfsck  = com->lc_lfsck;
01877         struct ptlrpc_thread    *thread = &lfsck->li_thread;
01878         struct l_wait_info       lwi;
01879 
01880         if (lfsck->li_sleep_jif > 0 &&
01881             com->lc_new_scanned >= lfsck->li_sleep_rate) {
01882                 lwi = LWI_TIMEOUT_INTR(lfsck->li_sleep_jif, NULL,
01883                                        LWI_ON_SIGNAL_NOOP, NULL);
01884 
01885                 l_wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq,
01886                              !thread_is_running(thread),
01887                              &lwi);
01888                 com->lc_new_scanned = 0;
01889         }
01890 }
01891 
01892 static struct lfsck_thread_args *
01893 lfsck_thread_args_init(struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
01894                        struct lfsck_component *com,
01895                        struct lfsck_start_param *lsp)
01896 {
01897         struct lfsck_thread_args *lta;
01898         int                       rc;
01899 
01900         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(lta);
01901         if (lta == NULL)
01902                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
01903 
01904         rc = lu_env_init(&lta->lta_env, LCT_MD_THREAD | LCT_DT_THREAD);
01905         if (rc != 0) {
01906                 OBD_FREE_PTR(lta);
01907                 return ERR_PTR(rc);
01908         }
01909 
01910         lta->lta_lfsck = lfsck_instance_get(lfsck);
01911         if (com != NULL)
01912                 lta->lta_com = lfsck_component_get(com);
01913 
01914         lta->lta_lsp = lsp;
01915 
01916         return lta;
01917 }
01918 
01919 void lfsck_thread_args_fini(struct lfsck_thread_args *lta)
01920 {
01921         if (lta->lta_com != NULL)
01922                 lfsck_component_put(&lta->lta_env, lta->lta_com);
01923         lfsck_instance_put(&lta->lta_env, lta->lta_lfsck);
01924         lu_env_fini(&lta->lta_env);
01925         OBD_FREE_PTR(lta);
01926 }
01927 
01928 struct lfsck_assistant_data *
01929 lfsck_assistant_data_init(struct lfsck_assistant_operations *lao,
01930                           const char *name)
01931 {
01932         struct lfsck_assistant_data *lad;
01933 
01934         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(lad);
01935         if (lad != NULL) {
01936                 lad->lad_bitmap = CFS_ALLOCATE_BITMAP(BITS_PER_LONG);
01937                 if (lad->lad_bitmap == NULL) {
01938                         OBD_FREE_PTR(lad);
01939                         return NULL;
01940                 }
01941 
01942                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lad->lad_req_list);
01943                 spin_lock_init(&lad->lad_lock);
01944                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lad->lad_ost_list);
01945                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lad->lad_ost_phase1_list);
01946                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lad->lad_ost_phase2_list);
01947                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lad->lad_mdt_list);
01948                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lad->lad_mdt_phase1_list);
01949                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lad->lad_mdt_phase2_list);
01950                 init_waitqueue_head(&lad->lad_thread.t_ctl_waitq);
01951                 lad->lad_ops = lao;
01952                 lad->lad_name = name;
01953         }
01954 
01955         return lad;
01956 }
01957 
01958 struct lfsck_assistant_object *
01959 lfsck_assistant_object_init(const struct lu_env *env, const struct lu_fid *fid,
01960                             const struct lu_attr *attr, __u64 cookie,
01961                             bool is_dir)
01962 {
01963         struct lfsck_assistant_object   *lso;
01964 
01965         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(lso);
01966         if (lso == NULL)
01967                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
01968 
01969         lso->lso_fid = *fid;
01970         if (attr != NULL)
01971                 lso->lso_attr = *attr;
01972 
01973         atomic_set(&lso->lso_ref, 1);
01974         lso->lso_oit_cookie = cookie;
01975         if (is_dir)
01976                 lso->lso_is_dir = 1;
01977 
01978         return lso;
01979 }
01980 
01981 struct dt_object *
01982 lfsck_assistant_object_load(const struct lu_env *env,
01983                             struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
01984                             struct lfsck_assistant_object *lso)
01985 {
01986         struct dt_object *obj;
01987 
01988         obj = lfsck_object_find_bottom(env, lfsck, &lso->lso_fid);
01989         if (IS_ERR(obj))
01990                 return obj;
01991 
01992         if (unlikely(!dt_object_exists(obj) || lfsck_is_dead_obj(obj))) {
01993                 lso->lso_dead = 1;
01994                 lfsck_object_put(env, obj);
01995 
01996                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOENT);
01997         }
01998 
01999         if (lso->lso_is_dir && unlikely(!dt_try_as_dir(env, obj))) {
02000                 lfsck_object_put(env, obj);
02001 
02002                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOTDIR);
02003         }
02004 
02005         return obj;
02006 }
02007 
02021 int lfsck_async_interpret_common(const struct lu_env *env,
02022                                  struct ptlrpc_request *req,
02023                                  void *args, int rc)
02024 {
02025         struct lfsck_async_interpret_args *laia = args;
02026         struct lfsck_component            *com  = laia->laia_com;
02027         struct lfsck_assistant_data       *lad  = com->lc_data;
02028         struct lfsck_tgt_descs            *ltds = laia->laia_ltds;
02029         struct lfsck_tgt_desc             *ltd  = laia->laia_ltd;
02030         struct lfsck_request              *lr   = laia->laia_lr;
02031 
02032         LASSERT(com->lc_lfsck->li_master);
02033 
02034         switch (lr->lr_event) {
02035         case LE_START:
02036                 if (rc != 0) {
02037                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: fail to notify %s %x for %s "
02038                                "start: rc = %d\n",
02039                                lfsck_lfsck2name(com->lc_lfsck),
02040                                (lr->lr_flags & LEF_TO_OST) ? "OST" : "MDT",
02041                                ltd->ltd_index, lad->lad_name, rc);
02042 
02043                         if (com->lc_type == LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT) {
02044                                 struct lfsck_layout *lo = com->lc_file_ram;
02045 
02046                                 if (lr->lr_flags & LEF_TO_OST)
02047                                         lfsck_lad_set_bitmap(env, com,
02048                                                              ltd->ltd_index);
02049                                 else
02050                                         lo->ll_flags |= LF_INCOMPLETE;
02051                         } else {
02052                                 struct lfsck_namespace *ns = com->lc_file_ram;
02053 
02054                                 /* If some MDT does not join the namespace
02055                                  * LFSCK, then we cannot know whether there
02056                                  * is some name entry on such MDT that with
02057                                  * the referenced MDT-object on this MDT or
02058                                  * not. So the namespace LFSCK on this MDT
02059                                  * cannot handle orphan MDT-objects properly.
02060                                  * So we mark the LFSCK as LF_INCOMPLETE and
02061                                  * skip orphan MDT-objects handling. */
02062                                 ns->ln_flags |= LF_INCOMPLETE;
02063                         }
02064                         break;
02065                 }
02066 
02067                 spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02068                 if (ltd->ltd_dead) {
02069                         spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02070                         break;
02071                 }
02072 
02073                 if (com->lc_type == LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT) {
02074                         struct list_head *list;
02075                         struct list_head *phase_list;
02076 
02077                         if (ltd->ltd_layout_done) {
02078                                 spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02079                                 break;
02080                         }
02081 
02082                         if (lr->lr_flags & LEF_TO_OST) {
02083                                 list = &lad->lad_ost_list;
02084                                 phase_list = &lad->lad_ost_phase1_list;
02085                         } else {
02086                                 list = &lad->lad_mdt_list;
02087                                 phase_list = &lad->lad_mdt_phase1_list;
02088                         }
02089 
02090                         if (list_empty(&ltd->ltd_layout_list))
02091                                 list_add_tail(&ltd->ltd_layout_list, list);
02092                         if (list_empty(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list))
02093                                 list_add_tail(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list,
02094                                               phase_list);
02095                 } else {
02096                         if (ltd->ltd_namespace_done) {
02097                                 spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02098                                 break;
02099                         }
02100 
02101                         if (list_empty(&ltd->ltd_namespace_list))
02102                                 list_add_tail(&ltd->ltd_namespace_list,
02103                                               &lad->lad_mdt_list);
02104                         if (list_empty(&ltd->ltd_namespace_phase_list))
02105                                 list_add_tail(&ltd->ltd_namespace_phase_list,
02106                                               &lad->lad_mdt_phase1_list);
02107                 }
02108                 spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02109                 break;
02110         case LE_STOP:
02111         case LE_PHASE1_DONE:
02112         case LE_PHASE2_DONE:
02113         case LE_PEER_EXIT:
02114                 if (rc != 0 && rc != -EALREADY)
02115                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: fail to notify %s %x for %s: "
02116                               "event = %d, rc = %d\n",
02117                               lfsck_lfsck2name(com->lc_lfsck),
02118                               (lr->lr_flags & LEF_TO_OST) ? "OST" : "MDT",
02119                               ltd->ltd_index, lad->lad_name, lr->lr_event, rc);
02120                 break;
02121         case LE_QUERY: {
02122                 struct lfsck_reply *reply;
02123                 struct list_head *list;
02124                 struct list_head *phase_list;
02125 
02126                 if (com->lc_type == LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT) {
02127                         list = &ltd->ltd_layout_list;
02128                         phase_list = &ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list;
02129                 } else {
02130                         list = &ltd->ltd_namespace_list;
02131                         phase_list = &ltd->ltd_namespace_phase_list;
02132                 }
02133 
02134                 if (rc != 0) {
02135                         if (lr->lr_flags & LEF_QUERY_ALL) {
02136                                 lfsck_reset_ltd_status(ltd, com->lc_type);
02137                                 break;
02138                         }
02139 
02140                         spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02141                         list_del_init(phase_list);
02142                         list_del_init(list);
02143                         spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02144                         break;
02145                 }
02146 
02147                 reply = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill,
02148                                                &RMF_LFSCK_REPLY);
02149                 if (reply == NULL) {
02150                         rc = -EPROTO;
02151                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: invalid query reply for %s: "
02152                                "rc = %d\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(com->lc_lfsck),
02153                                lad->lad_name, rc);
02154 
02155                         if (lr->lr_flags & LEF_QUERY_ALL) {
02156                                 lfsck_reset_ltd_status(ltd, com->lc_type);
02157                                 break;
02158                         }
02159 
02160                         spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02161                         list_del_init(phase_list);
02162                         list_del_init(list);
02163                         spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02164                         break;
02165                 }
02166 
02167                 if (lr->lr_flags & LEF_QUERY_ALL) {
02168                         if (com->lc_type == LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT) {
02169                                 ltd->ltd_layout_status = reply->lr_status;
02170                                 ltd->ltd_layout_repaired = reply->lr_repaired;
02171                         } else {
02172                                 ltd->ltd_namespace_status = reply->lr_status;
02173                                 ltd->ltd_namespace_repaired =
02174                                                         reply->lr_repaired;
02175                         }
02176                         break;
02177                 }
02178 
02179                 switch (reply->lr_status) {
02180                 case LS_SCANNING_PHASE1:
02181                         break;
02182                 case LS_SCANNING_PHASE2:
02183                         spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02184                         list_del_init(phase_list);
02185                         if (ltd->ltd_dead) {
02186                                 spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02187                                 break;
02188                         }
02189 
02190                         if (com->lc_type == LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT) {
02191                                 if (ltd->ltd_layout_done) {
02192                                         spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02193                                         break;
02194                                 }
02195 
02196                                 if (lr->lr_flags & LEF_TO_OST)
02197                                         list_add_tail(phase_list,
