02198                                                 &lad->lad_ost_phase2_list);
02199                                 else
02200                                         list_add_tail(phase_list,
02201                                                 &lad->lad_mdt_phase2_list);
02202                         } else {
02203                                 if (ltd->ltd_namespace_done) {
02204                                         spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02205                                         break;
02206                                 }
02207 
02208                                 list_add_tail(phase_list,
02209                                               &lad->lad_mdt_phase2_list);
02210                         }
02211                         spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02212                         break;
02213                 default:
02214                         spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02215                         list_del_init(phase_list);
02216                         list_del_init(list);
02217                         spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02218                         break;
02219                 }
02220                 break;
02221         }
02222         default:
02223                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: unexpected event: rc = %d\n",
02224                        lfsck_lfsck2name(com->lc_lfsck), lr->lr_event);
02225                 break;
02226         }
02227 
02228         if (!laia->laia_shared) {
02229                 lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
02230                 lfsck_component_put(env, com);
02231         }
02232 
02233         return 0;
02234 }
02235 
02236 static void lfsck_interpret(const struct lu_env *env,
02237                             struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
02238                             struct ptlrpc_request *req, void *args, int result)
02239 {
02240         struct lfsck_async_interpret_args *laia = args;
02241         struct lfsck_component            *com;
02242 
02243         LASSERT(laia->laia_com == NULL);
02244         LASSERT(laia->laia_shared);
02245 
02246         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
02247         list_for_each_entry(com, &lfsck->li_list_scan, lc_link) {
02248                 laia->laia_com = com;
02249                 lfsck_async_interpret_common(env, req, laia, result);
02250         }
02251 
02252         list_for_each_entry(com, &lfsck->li_list_double_scan, lc_link) {
02253                 laia->laia_com = com;
02254                 lfsck_async_interpret_common(env, req, laia, result);
02255         }
02256         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
02257 }
02258 
02259 static int lfsck_stop_notify(const struct lu_env *env,
02260                              struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
02261                              struct lfsck_tgt_descs *ltds,
02262                              struct lfsck_tgt_desc *ltd, __u16 type)
02263 {
02264         struct lfsck_component *com;
02265         int                     rc = 0;
02266         ENTRY;
02267 
02268         LASSERT(lfsck->li_master);
02269 
02270         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
02271         com = __lfsck_component_find(lfsck, type, &lfsck->li_list_scan);
02272         if (com == NULL)
02273                 com = __lfsck_component_find(lfsck, type,
02274                                              &lfsck->li_list_double_scan);
02275         if (com != NULL)
02276                 lfsck_component_get(com);
02277         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
02278 
02279         if (com != NULL) {
02280                 struct lfsck_thread_info          *info  = lfsck_env_info(env);
02281                 struct lfsck_async_interpret_args *laia  = &info->lti_laia;
02282                 struct lfsck_request              *lr    = &info->lti_lr;
02283                 struct lfsck_assistant_data       *lad   = com->lc_data;
02284                 struct list_head                  *list;
02285                 struct list_head                  *phase_list;
02286                 struct ptlrpc_request_set         *set;
02287 
02288                 set = ptlrpc_prep_set();
02289                 if (set == NULL) {
02290                         lfsck_component_put(env, com);
02291 
02292                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
02293                 }
02294 
02295                 if (type == LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT) {
02296                         list = &ltd->ltd_layout_list;
02297                         phase_list = &ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list;
02298                 } else {
02299                         list = &ltd->ltd_namespace_list;
02300                         phase_list = &ltd->ltd_namespace_phase_list;
02301                 }
02302 
02303                 spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02304                 if (list_empty(list)) {
02305                         LASSERT(list_empty(phase_list));
02306                         spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02307                         ptlrpc_set_destroy(set);
02308 
02309                         RETURN(0);
02310                 }
02311 
02312                 list_del_init(phase_list);
02313                 list_del_init(list);
02314                 spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
02315 
02316                 memset(lr, 0, sizeof(*lr));
02317                 lr->lr_index = lfsck_dev_idx(lfsck);
02318                 lr->lr_event = LE_PEER_EXIT;
02319                 lr->lr_active = type;
02320                 lr->lr_status = LS_CO_PAUSED;
02321                 if (ltds == &lfsck->li_ost_descs)
02322                         lr->lr_flags = LEF_TO_OST;
02323 
02324                 memset(laia, 0, sizeof(*laia));
02325                 laia->laia_com = com;
02326                 laia->laia_ltds = ltds;
02327                 atomic_inc(&ltd->ltd_ref);
02328                 laia->laia_ltd = ltd;
02329                 laia->laia_lr = lr;
02330 
02331                 rc = lfsck_async_request(env, ltd->ltd_exp, lr, set,
02332                                          lfsck_async_interpret_common,
02333                                          laia, LFSCK_NOTIFY);
02334                 if (rc != 0) {
02335                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: fail to notify %s %x for "
02336                                "co-stop for %s: rc = %d\n",
02337                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
02338                                (lr->lr_flags & LEF_TO_OST) ? "OST" : "MDT",
02339                                ltd->ltd_index, lad->lad_name, rc);
02340                         lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
02341                 } else {
02342                         rc = ptlrpc_set_wait(set);
02343                 }
02344 
02345                 ptlrpc_set_destroy(set);
02346                 lfsck_component_put(env, com);
02347         }
02348 
02349         RETURN(rc);
02350 }
02351 
02352 static int lfsck_async_interpret(const struct lu_env *env,
02353                                  struct ptlrpc_request *req,
02354                                  void *args, int rc)
02355 {
02356         struct lfsck_async_interpret_args *laia = args;
02357         struct lfsck_instance             *lfsck;
02358 
02359         lfsck = container_of0(laia->laia_ltds, struct lfsck_instance,
02360                               li_mdt_descs);
02361         lfsck_interpret(env, lfsck, req, laia, rc);
02362         lfsck_tgt_put(laia->laia_ltd);
02363         if (rc != 0 && laia->laia_result != -EALREADY)
02364                 laia->laia_result = rc;
02365 
02366         return 0;
02367 }
02368 
02369 int lfsck_async_request(const struct lu_env *env, struct obd_export *exp,
02370                         struct lfsck_request *lr,
02371                         struct ptlrpc_request_set *set,
02372                         ptlrpc_interpterer_t interpreter,
02373                         void *args, int request)
02374 {
02375         struct lfsck_async_interpret_args *laia;
02376         struct ptlrpc_request             *req;
02377         struct lfsck_request              *tmp;
02378         struct req_format                 *format;
02379         int                                rc;
02380 
02381         switch (request) {
02382         case LFSCK_NOTIFY:
02383                 format = &RQF_LFSCK_NOTIFY;
02384                 break;
02385         case LFSCK_QUERY:
02386                 format = &RQF_LFSCK_QUERY;
02387                 break;
02388         default:
02389                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: unknown async request %d: rc = %d\n",
02390                        exp->exp_obd->obd_name, request, -EINVAL);
02391                 return -EINVAL;
02392         }
02393 
02394         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc(class_exp2cliimp(exp), format);
02395         if (req == NULL)
02396                 return -ENOMEM;
02397 
02398         rc = ptlrpc_request_pack(req, LUSTRE_OBD_VERSION, request);
02399         if (rc != 0) {
02400                 ptlrpc_request_free(req);
02401 
02402                 return rc;
02403         }
02404 
02405         tmp = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_LFSCK_REQUEST);
02406         *tmp = *lr;
02407         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
02408 
02409         laia = ptlrpc_req_async_args(req);
02410         *laia = *(struct lfsck_async_interpret_args *)args;
02411         if (laia->laia_com != NULL)
02412                 lfsck_component_get(laia->laia_com);
02413         req->rq_interpret_reply = interpreter;
02414         req->rq_allow_intr = 1;
02415         ptlrpc_set_add_req(set, req);
02416 
02417         return 0;
02418 }
02419 
02420 int lfsck_query_all(const struct lu_env *env, struct lfsck_component *com)
02421 {
02422         struct lfsck_thread_info          *info  = lfsck_env_info(env);
02423         struct lfsck_request              *lr    = &info->lti_lr;
02424         struct lfsck_async_interpret_args *laia  = &info->lti_laia;
02425         struct lfsck_instance             *lfsck = com->lc_lfsck;
02426         struct lfsck_tgt_descs            *ltds  = &lfsck->li_mdt_descs;
02427         struct lfsck_tgt_desc             *ltd;
02428         struct ptlrpc_request_set         *set;
02429         int                                idx;
02430         int                                rc;
02431         ENTRY;
02432 
02433         memset(lr, 0, sizeof(*lr));
02434         lr->lr_event = LE_QUERY;
02435         lr->lr_active = com->lc_type;
02436         lr->lr_flags = LEF_QUERY_ALL;
02437 
02438         memset(laia, 0, sizeof(*laia));
02439         laia->laia_com = com;
02440         laia->laia_lr = lr;
02441 
02442         set = ptlrpc_prep_set();
02443         if (set == NULL)
02444                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
02445 
02446 again:
02447         laia->laia_ltds = ltds;
02448         down_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
02449         cfs_foreach_bit(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap, idx) {
02450                 ltd = lfsck_tgt_get(ltds, idx);
02451                 LASSERT(ltd != NULL);
02452 
02453                 laia->laia_ltd = ltd;
02454                 up_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
02455                 rc = lfsck_async_request(env, ltd->ltd_exp, lr, set,
02456                                          lfsck_async_interpret_common,
02457                                          laia, LFSCK_QUERY);
02458                 if (rc != 0) {
02459                         struct lfsck_assistant_data *lad = com->lc_data;
02460 
02461                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: Fail to query %s %x for stat %s: "
02462                                "rc = %d\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
02463                                (lr->lr_flags & LEF_TO_OST) ? "OST" : "MDT",
02464                                ltd->ltd_index, lad->lad_name, rc);
02465                         lfsck_reset_ltd_status(ltd, com->lc_type);
02466                         lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
02467                 }
02468                 down_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
02469         }
02470         up_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
02471 
02472         if (com->lc_type == LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT && !(lr->lr_flags & LEF_TO_OST)) {
02473                 ltds = &lfsck->li_ost_descs;
02474                 lr->lr_flags |= LEF_TO_OST;
02475                 goto again;
02476         }
02477 
02478         rc = ptlrpc_set_wait(set);
02479         ptlrpc_set_destroy(set);
02480 
02481         RETURN(rc);
02482 }
02483 
02484 int lfsck_start_assistant(const struct lu_env *env, struct lfsck_component *com,
02485                           struct lfsck_start_param *lsp)
02486 {
02487         struct lfsck_instance           *lfsck   = com->lc_lfsck;
02488         struct lfsck_assistant_data     *lad     = com->lc_data;
02489         struct ptlrpc_thread            *mthread = &lfsck->li_thread;
02490         struct ptlrpc_thread            *athread = &lad->lad_thread;
02491         struct lfsck_thread_args        *lta;
02492         struct task_struct              *task;
02493         int                              rc;
02494         ENTRY;
02495 
02496         lad->lad_assistant_status = 0;
02497         lad->lad_post_result = 0;
02498         lad->lad_to_post = 0;
02499         lad->lad_to_double_scan = 0;
02500         lad->lad_in_double_scan = 0;
02501         lad->lad_exit = 0;
02502         lad->lad_advance_lock = false;
02503         thread_set_flags(athread, 0);
02504 
02505         lta = lfsck_thread_args_init(lfsck, com, lsp);
02506         if (IS_ERR(lta))
02507                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(lta));
02508 
02509         task = kthread_run(lfsck_assistant_engine, lta, lad->lad_name);
02510         if (IS_ERR(task)) {
02511                 rc = PTR_ERR(task);
02512                 CERROR("%s: cannot start LFSCK assistant thread for %s: "
02513                        "rc = %d\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), lad->lad_name, rc);
02514                 lfsck_thread_args_fini(lta);
02515         } else {
02516                 struct l_wait_info lwi = { 0 };
02517 
02518                 l_wait_event(mthread->t_ctl_waitq,
02519                              thread_is_running(athread) ||
02520                              thread_is_stopped(athread),
02521                              &lwi);
02522                 if (unlikely(!thread_is_running(athread)))
02523                         rc = lad->lad_assistant_status;
02524                 else
02525                         rc = 0;
02526         }
02527 
02528         RETURN(rc);
02529 }
02530 
02531 int lfsck_checkpoint_generic(const struct lu_env *env,
02532                              struct lfsck_component *com)
02533 {
02534         struct lfsck_assistant_data     *lad     = com->lc_data;
02535         struct ptlrpc_thread            *mthread = &com->lc_lfsck->li_thread;
02536         struct ptlrpc_thread            *athread = &lad->lad_thread;
02537         struct l_wait_info               lwi     = { 0 };
02538 
02539         l_wait_event(mthread->t_ctl_waitq,
02540                      list_empty(&lad->lad_req_list) ||
02541                      !thread_is_running(mthread) ||
02542                      thread_is_stopped(athread),
02543                      &lwi);
02544 
02545         if (!thread_is_running(mthread) || thread_is_stopped(athread))
02546                 return LFSCK_CHECKPOINT_SKIP;
02547 
02548         return 0;
02549 }
02550 
02551 void lfsck_post_generic(const struct lu_env *env,
02552                         struct lfsck_component *com, int *result)
02553 {
02554         struct lfsck_assistant_data     *lad     = com->lc_data;
02555         struct ptlrpc_thread            *athread = &lad->lad_thread;
02556         struct ptlrpc_thread            *mthread = &com->lc_lfsck->li_thread;
02557         struct l_wait_info               lwi     = { 0 };
02558 
02559         lad->lad_post_result = *result;
02560         if (*result <= 0)
02561                 lad->lad_exit = 1;
02562         lad->lad_to_post = 1;
02563 
02564         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: waiting for assistant to do %s post, rc = %d\n",
02565                lfsck_lfsck2name(com->lc_lfsck), lad->lad_name, *result);
02566 
02567         wake_up_all(&athread->t_ctl_waitq);
02568         l_wait_event(mthread->t_ctl_waitq,
02569                      (*result > 0 && list_empty(&lad->lad_req_list)) ||
02570                      thread_is_stopped(athread),
02571                      &lwi);
02572 
02573         if (lad->lad_assistant_status < 0)
02574                 *result = lad->lad_assistant_status;
02575 
02576         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: the assistant has done %s post, rc = %d\n",
02577                lfsck_lfsck2name(com->lc_lfsck), lad->lad_name, *result);
02578 }
02579 
02580 int lfsck_double_scan_generic(const struct lu_env *env,
02581                               struct lfsck_component *com, int status)
02582 {
02583         struct lfsck_assistant_data     *lad     = com->lc_data;
02584         struct ptlrpc_thread            *mthread = &com->lc_lfsck->li_thread;
02585         struct ptlrpc_thread            *athread = &lad->lad_thread;
02586         struct l_wait_info               lwi     = { 0 };
02587 
02588         if (status != LS_SCANNING_PHASE2)
02589                 lad->lad_exit = 1;
02590         else
02591                 lad->lad_to_double_scan = 1;
02592 
02593         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: waiting for assistant to do %s double_scan, "
02594                "status %d\n",
02595                lfsck_lfsck2name(com->lc_lfsck), lad->lad_name, status);
02596 
02597         wake_up_all(&athread->t_ctl_waitq);
02598         l_wait_event(mthread->t_ctl_waitq,
02599                      lad->lad_in_double_scan ||
02600                      thread_is_stopped(athread),
02601                      &lwi);
02602 
02603         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: the assistant has done %s double_scan, "
02604                "status %d\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(com->lc_lfsck), lad->lad_name,
02605                lad->lad_assistant_status);
02606 
02607         if (lad->lad_assistant_status < 0)
02608                 return lad->lad_assistant_status;
02609 
02610         return 0;
02611 }
02612 
02613 void lfsck_quit_generic(const struct lu_env *env,
02614                         struct lfsck_component *com)
02615 {
02616         struct lfsck_assistant_data     *lad     = com->lc_data;
02617         struct ptlrpc_thread            *mthread = &com->lc_lfsck->li_thread;
02618         struct ptlrpc_thread            *athread = &lad->lad_thread;
02619         struct l_wait_info               lwi     = { 0 };
02620 
02621         lad->lad_exit = 1;
02622         wake_up_all(&athread->t_ctl_waitq);
02623         l_wait_event(mthread->t_ctl_waitq,
02624                      thread_is_init(athread) ||
02625                      thread_is_stopped(athread),
02626                      &lwi);
02627 }
02628 
02629 /* external interfaces */
02630 
02631 int lfsck_get_speed(struct seq_file *m, struct dt_device *key)
02632 {
02633         struct lu_env           env;
02634         struct lfsck_instance  *lfsck;
02635         int                     rc;
02636         ENTRY;
02637 
02638         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_MD_THREAD | LCT_DT_THREAD);
02639         if (rc != 0)
02640                 RETURN(rc);
02641 
02642         lfsck = lfsck_instance_find(key, true, false);
02643         if (likely(lfsck != NULL)) {
02644                 seq_printf(m, "%u\n", lfsck->li_bookmark_ram.lb_speed_limit);
02645                 lfsck_instance_put(&env, lfsck);
02646         } else {
02647                 rc = -ENXIO;
02648         }
02649 
02650         lu_env_fini(&env);
02651 
02652         RETURN(rc);
02653 }
02654 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lfsck_get_speed);
02655 
02656 int lfsck_set_speed(struct dt_device *key, __u32 val)
02657 {
02658         struct lu_env           env;
02659         struct lfsck_instance  *lfsck;
02660         int                     rc;
02661         ENTRY;
02662 
02663         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_MD_THREAD | LCT_DT_THREAD);
02664         if (rc != 0)
02665                 RETURN(rc);
02666 
02667         lfsck = lfsck_instance_find(key, true, false);
02668         if (likely(lfsck != NULL)) {
02669                 mutex_lock(&lfsck->li_mutex);
02670                 if (__lfsck_set_speed(lfsck, val))
02671                         rc = lfsck_bookmark_store(&env, lfsck);
02672                 mutex_unlock(&lfsck->li_mutex);
02673                 lfsck_instance_put(&env, lfsck);
02674         } else {
02675                 rc = -ENXIO;
02676         }
02677 
02678         lu_env_fini(&env);
02679 
02680         RETURN(rc);
02681 }
02682 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lfsck_set_speed);
02683 
02684 int lfsck_get_windows(struct seq_file *m, struct dt_device *key)
02685 {
02686         struct lu_env           env;
02687         struct lfsck_instance  *lfsck;
02688         int                     rc;
02689         ENTRY;
02690 
02691         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_MD_THREAD | LCT_DT_THREAD);
02692         if (rc != 0)
02693                 RETURN(rc);
02694 
02695         lfsck = lfsck_instance_find(key, true, false);
02696         if (likely(lfsck != NULL)) {
02697                 seq_printf(m, "%u\n", lfsck->li_bookmark_ram.lb_async_windows);
02698                 lfsck_instance_put(&env, lfsck);
02699         } else {
02700                 rc = -ENXIO;
02701         }
02702 
02703         lu_env_fini(&env);
02704 
02705         RETURN(rc);
02706 }
02707 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lfsck_get_windows);
02708 
02709 int lfsck_set_windows(struct dt_device *key, int val)
02710 {
02711         struct lu_env           env;
02712         struct lfsck_instance  *lfsck;
02713         int                     rc;
02714         ENTRY;
02715 
02716         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_MD_THREAD | LCT_DT_THREAD);
02717         if (rc != 0)
02718                 RETURN(rc);
02719 
02720         lfsck = lfsck_instance_find(key, true, false);
02721         if (likely(lfsck != NULL)) {
02722                 if (val < 1 || val > LFSCK_ASYNC_WIN_MAX) {
02723                         CWARN("%s: invalid async windows size that may "
02724                               "cause memory issues. The valid range is "
02725                               "[1 - %u].\n",
02726                               lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), LFSCK_ASYNC_WIN_MAX);
02727                         rc = -EINVAL;
02728                 } else if (lfsck->li_bookmark_ram.lb_async_windows != val) {
02729                         mutex_lock(&lfsck->li_mutex);
02730                         lfsck->li_bookmark_ram.lb_async_windows = val;
02731                         rc = lfsck_bookmark_store(&env, lfsck);
02732                         mutex_unlock(&lfsck->li_mutex);
02733                 }
02734                 lfsck_instance_put(&env, lfsck);
02735         } else {
02736                 rc = -ENXIO;
02737         }
02738 
02739         lu_env_fini(&env);
02740 
02741         RETURN(rc);
02742 }
02743 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lfsck_set_windows);
02744 
02745 int lfsck_dump(struct seq_file *m, struct dt_device *key, enum lfsck_type type)
02746 {
02747         struct lu_env           env;
02748         struct lfsck_instance  *lfsck;
02749         struct lfsck_component *com;
02750         int                     rc;
02751         ENTRY;
02752 
02753         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_MD_THREAD | LCT_DT_THREAD);
02754         if (rc != 0)
02755                 RETURN(rc);
02756 
02757         lfsck = lfsck_instance_find(key, true, false);
02758         if (likely(lfsck != NULL)) {
02759                 com = lfsck_component_find(lfsck, type);
02760                 if (likely(com != NULL)) {
02761                         com->lc_ops->lfsck_dump(&env, com, m);
02762                         lfsck_component_put(&env, com);
02763                 } else {
02764                         rc = -ENOTSUPP;
02765                 }
02766 
02767                 lfsck_instance_put(&env, lfsck);
02768         } else {
02769                 rc = -ENXIO;
02770         }
02771 
02772         lu_env_fini(&env);
02773 
02774         RETURN(rc);
02775 }
02776 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lfsck_dump);
02777 
02778 static int lfsck_stop_all(const struct lu_env *env,
02779                           struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
02780                           struct lfsck_stop *stop)
02781 {
02782         struct lfsck_thread_info          *info   = lfsck_env_info(env);
02783         struct lfsck_request              *lr     = &info->lti_lr;
02784         struct lfsck_async_interpret_args *laia   = &info->lti_laia;
02785         struct ptlrpc_request_set         *set;
02786         struct lfsck_tgt_descs            *ltds   = &lfsck->li_mdt_descs;
02787         struct lfsck_tgt_desc             *ltd;
02788         struct lfsck_bookmark             *bk     = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
02789         __u32                              idx;
02790         int                                rc     = 0;
02791         int                                rc1    = 0;
02792         ENTRY;
02793 
02794         LASSERT(stop->ls_flags & LPF_BROADCAST);
02795 
02796         set = ptlrpc_prep_set();
02797         if (unlikely(set == NULL))
02798                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
02799 
02800         memset(lr, 0, sizeof(*lr));
02801         lr->lr_event = LE_STOP;
02802         lr->lr_index = lfsck_dev_idx(lfsck);
02803         lr->lr_status = stop->ls_status;
02804         lr->lr_version = bk->lb_version;
02805         lr->lr_active = LFSCK_TYPES_ALL;
02806         lr->lr_param = stop->ls_flags;
02807 
02808         memset(laia, 0, sizeof(*laia));
02809         laia->laia_ltds = ltds;
02810         laia->laia_lr = lr;
02811         laia->laia_shared = 1;
02812 
02813         down_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
02814         cfs_foreach_bit(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap, idx) {
02815                 ltd = lfsck_tgt_get(ltds, idx);
02816                 LASSERT(ltd != NULL);
02817 
02818                 laia->laia_ltd = ltd;
02819                 rc = lfsck_async_request(env, ltd->ltd_exp, lr, set,
02820                                          lfsck_async_interpret, laia,
02821                                          LFSCK_NOTIFY);
02822                 if (rc != 0) {
02823                         lfsck_interpret(env, lfsck, NULL, laia, rc);
02824                         lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
02825                         CERROR("%s: cannot notify MDT %x for LFSCK stop: "
02826                                "rc = %d\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), idx, rc);
02827                         rc1 = rc;
02828                 }
02829         }
02830         up_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
02831 
02832         rc = ptlrpc_set_wait(set);
02833         ptlrpc_set_destroy(set);
02834 
02835         if (rc == 0)
02836                 rc = laia->laia_result;
02837 
02838         if (rc == -EALREADY)
02839                 rc = 0;
02840 
02841         if (rc != 0)
02842                 CERROR("%s: fail to stop LFSCK on some MDTs: rc = %d\n",
02843                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), rc);
02844 
02845         RETURN(rc != 0 ? rc : rc1);
02846 }
02847 
02848 static int lfsck_start_all(const struct lu_env *env,
02849                            struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
02850                            struct lfsck_start *start)
02851 {
02852         struct lfsck_thread_info          *info   = lfsck_env_info(env);
02853         struct lfsck_request              *lr     = &info->lti_lr;
02854         struct lfsck_async_interpret_args *laia   = &info->lti_laia;
02855         struct ptlrpc_request_set         *set;
02856         struct lfsck_tgt_descs            *ltds   = &lfsck->li_mdt_descs;
02857         struct lfsck_tgt_desc             *ltd;
02858         struct lfsck_bookmark             *bk     = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
02859         __u32                              idx;
02860         int                                rc     = 0;
02861         ENTRY;
02862 
02863         LASSERT(start->ls_flags & LPF_BROADCAST);
02864 
02865         set = ptlrpc_prep_set();
02866         if (unlikely(set == NULL))
02867                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
02868 
02869         memset(lr, 0, sizeof(*lr));
02870         lr->lr_event = LE_START;
02871         lr->lr_index = lfsck_dev_idx(lfsck);
02872         lr->lr_speed = bk->lb_speed_limit;
02873         lr->lr_version = bk->lb_version;
02874         lr->lr_active = start->ls_active;
02875         lr->lr_param = start->ls_flags;
02876         lr->lr_async_windows = bk->lb_async_windows;
02877         lr->lr_valid = LSV_SPEED_LIMIT | LSV_ERROR_HANDLE | LSV_DRYRUN |
02878                        LSV_ASYNC_WINDOWS | LSV_CREATE_OSTOBJ |
02879                        LSV_CREATE_MDTOBJ;
02880 
02881         memset(laia, 0, sizeof(*laia));
02882         laia->laia_ltds = ltds;
02883         laia->laia_lr = lr;
02884         laia->laia_shared = 1;
02885 
02886         down_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
02887         cfs_foreach_bit(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap, idx) {
02888                 ltd = lfsck_tgt_get(ltds, idx);
02889                 LASSERT(ltd != NULL);
02890 
02891                 laia->laia_ltd = ltd;
02892                 ltd->ltd_layout_done = 0;
02893                 ltd->ltd_namespace_done = 0;
02894                 ltd->ltd_synced_failures = 0;
02895                 rc = lfsck_async_request(env, ltd->ltd_exp, lr, set,
02896                                          lfsck_async_interpret, laia,
02897                                          LFSCK_NOTIFY);
02898                 if (rc != 0) {
02899                         lfsck_interpret(env, lfsck, NULL, laia, rc);
02900                         lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
02901                         CERROR("%s: cannot notify MDT %x for LFSCK "
02902                                "start, failout: rc = %d\n",
02903                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), idx, rc);
02904                         break;
02905                 }
02906         }
02907         up_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
02908 
02909         if (rc != 0) {
02910                 ptlrpc_set_destroy(set);
02911 
02912                 RETURN(rc);
02913         }
02914 
02915         rc = ptlrpc_set_wait(set);
02916         ptlrpc_set_destroy(set);
02917 
02918         if (rc == 0)
02919                 rc = laia->laia_result;
02920 
02921         if (rc != 0) {
02922                 struct lfsck_stop *stop = &info->lti_stop;
02923 
02924                 CERROR("%s: cannot start LFSCK on some MDTs, "
02925                        "stop all: rc = %d\n",
02926                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), rc);
02927                 if (rc != -EALREADY) {
02928                         stop->ls_status = LS_FAILED;
02929                         stop->ls_flags = LPF_ALL_TGT | LPF_BROADCAST;
02930                         lfsck_stop_all(env, lfsck, stop);
02931                 }
02932         }
02933 
02934         RETURN(rc);
02935 }
02936 
02937 int lfsck_start(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key,
02938                 struct lfsck_start_param *lsp)
02939 {
02940         struct lfsck_start              *start  = lsp->lsp_start;
02941         struct lfsck_instance           *lfsck;
02942         struct lfsck_bookmark           *bk;
02943         struct ptlrpc_thread            *thread;
02944         struct lfsck_component          *com;
02945         struct l_wait_info               lwi    = { 0 };
02946         struct lfsck_thread_args        *lta;
02947         struct task_struct              *task;
02948         struct lfsck_tgt_descs          *ltds;
02949         struct lfsck_tgt_desc           *ltd;
02950         __u32                            idx;
02951         int                              rc     = 0;
02952         __u16                            valid  = 0;
02953         __u16                            flags  = 0;
02954         __u16                            type   = 1;
02955         ENTRY;
02956 
02957         lfsck = lfsck_instance_find(key, true, false);
02958         if (unlikely(lfsck == NULL))
02959                 RETURN(-ENXIO);
02960 
02961         /* System is not ready, try again later. */
02962         if (unlikely(lfsck->li_namespace == NULL))
02963                 GOTO(put, rc = -EAGAIN);
02964 
02965         /* start == NULL means auto trigger paused LFSCK. */
02966         if ((start == NULL) &&
02967             (list_empty(&lfsck->li_list_scan) ||
02968              OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_NO_AUTO)))
02969                 GOTO(put, rc = 0);
02970 
02971         bk = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
02972         thread = &lfsck->li_thread;
02973         mutex_lock(&lfsck->li_mutex);
02974         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
02975         if (!thread_is_init(thread) && !thread_is_stopped(thread)) {
02976                 rc = -EALREADY;
02977                 if (unlikely(start == NULL)) {
02978                         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
02979                         GOTO(out, rc);
02980                 }
02981 
02982                 while (start->ls_active != 0) {
02983                         if (!(type & start->ls_active)) {
02984                                 type <<= 1;
02985                                 continue;
02986                         }
02987 
02988                         com = __lfsck_component_find(lfsck, type,
02989                                                      &lfsck->li_list_scan);
02990                         if (com == NULL)
02991                                 com = __lfsck_component_find(lfsck, type,
02992                                                 &lfsck->li_list_double_scan);
02993                         if (com == NULL) {
02994                                 rc = -EOPNOTSUPP;
02995                                 break;
02996                         }
02997 
02998                         if (com->lc_ops->lfsck_join != NULL) {
02999                                 rc = com->lc_ops->lfsck_join( env, com, lsp);
03000                                 if (rc != 0 && rc != -EALREADY)
03001                                         break;
03002                         }
03003                         start->ls_active &= ~type;
03004                         type <<= 1;
03005                 }
03006                 spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
03007                 GOTO(out, rc);
03008         }
03009         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
03010 
03011         lfsck->li_status = 0;
03012         lfsck->li_oit_over = 0;
03013         lfsck->li_start_unplug = 0;
03014         lfsck->li_drop_dryrun = 0;
03015         lfsck->li_new_scanned = 0;
03016 
03017         /* For auto trigger. */
03018         if (start == NULL)
03019                 goto trigger;
03020 
03021         if (start->ls_flags & LPF_BROADCAST && !lfsck->li_master) {
03022                 CERROR("%s: only allow to specify '-A | -o' via MDS\n",
03023                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck));
03024 
03025                 GOTO(out, rc = -EPERM);
03026         }
03027 
03028         start->ls_version = bk->lb_version;
03029 
03030         if (start->ls_active != 0) {
03031                 struct lfsck_component *next;
03032 
03033                 if (start->ls_active == LFSCK_TYPES_ALL)
03034                         start->ls_active = LFSCK_TYPES_SUPPORTED;
03035 
03036                 if (start->ls_active & ~LFSCK_TYPES_SUPPORTED) {
03037                         start->ls_active &= ~LFSCK_TYPES_SUPPORTED;
03038                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOTSUPP);
03039                 }
03040 
03041                 list_for_each_entry_safe(com, next,
03042                                          &lfsck->li_list_scan, lc_link) {
03043                         if (!(com->lc_type & start->ls_active)) {
03044                                 rc = com->lc_ops->lfsck_post(env, com, 0,
03045                                                              false);
03046                                 if (rc != 0)
03047                                         GOTO(out, rc);
03048                         }
03049                 }
03050 
03051                 while (start->ls_active != 0) {
03052                         if (type & start->ls_active) {
03053                                 com = __lfsck_component_find(lfsck, type,
03054                                                         &lfsck->li_list_idle);
03055                                 if (com != NULL)
03056                                         /* The component status will be updated
03057                                          * when its prep() is called later by
03058                                          * the LFSCK main engine. */
03059                                         list_move_tail(&com->lc_link,
03060                                                        &lfsck->li_list_scan);
03061                                 start->ls_active &= ~type;
03062                         }
03063                         type <<= 1;
03064                 }
03065         }
03066 
03067         if (list_empty(&lfsck->li_list_scan)) {
03068                 /* The speed limit will be used to control both the LFSCK and
03069                  * low layer scrub (if applied), need to be handled firstly. */
03070                 if (start->ls_valid & LSV_SPEED_LIMIT) {
03071                         if (__lfsck_set_speed(lfsck, start->ls_speed_limit)) {
03072                                 rc = lfsck_bookmark_store(env, lfsck);
03073                                 if (rc != 0)
03074                                         GOTO(out, rc);
03075                         }
03076                 }
03077 
03078                 goto trigger;
03079         }
03080 
03081         if (start->ls_flags & LPF_RESET)
03082                 flags |= DOIF_RESET;
03083 
03084         rc = lfsck_set_param(env, lfsck, start, !!(flags & DOIF_RESET));
03085         if (rc != 0)
03086                 GOTO(out, rc);
03087 
03088         list_for_each_entry(com, &lfsck->li_list_scan, lc_link) {
03089                 start->ls_active |= com->lc_type;
03090                 if (flags & DOIF_RESET) {
03091                         rc = com->lc_ops->lfsck_reset(env, com, false);
03092                         if (rc != 0)
03093                                 GOTO(out, rc);
03094                 }
03095         }
03096 
03097         ltds = &lfsck->li_mdt_descs;
03098         down_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
03099         cfs_foreach_bit(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap, idx) {
03100                 ltd = lfsck_ltd2tgt(ltds, idx);
03101                 LASSERT(ltd != NULL);
03102 
03103                 ltd->ltd_layout_done = 0;
03104                 ltd->ltd_namespace_done = 0;
03105                 ltd->ltd_synced_failures = 0;
03106                 lfsck_reset_ltd_status(ltd, LFSCK_TYPE_NAMESPACE);
03107                 lfsck_reset_ltd_status(ltd, LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT);
03108                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list);
03109                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_list);
03110                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_namespace_phase_list);
03111                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_namespace_list);
03112         }
03113         up_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
03114 
03115         ltds = &lfsck->li_ost_descs;
03116         down_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
03117         cfs_foreach_bit(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap, idx) {
03118                 ltd = lfsck_ltd2tgt(ltds, idx);
03119                 LASSERT(ltd != NULL);
03120 
03121                 ltd->ltd_layout_done = 0;
03122                 ltd->ltd_synced_failures = 0;
03123                 lfsck_reset_ltd_status(ltd, LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT);
03124                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list);
03125                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_list);
03126         }
03127         up_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
03128 
03129 trigger:
03130         lfsck->li_args_dir = LUDA_64BITHASH | LUDA_VERIFY | LUDA_TYPE;
03131         if (bk->lb_param & LPF_DRYRUN)
03132                 lfsck->li_args_dir |= LUDA_VERIFY_DRYRUN;
03133 
03134         if (start != NULL && start->ls_valid & LSV_ERROR_HANDLE) {
03135                 valid |= DOIV_ERROR_HANDLE;
03136                 if (start->ls_flags & LPF_FAILOUT)
03137                         flags |= DOIF_FAILOUT;
03138         }
03139 
03140         if (start != NULL && start->ls_valid & LSV_DRYRUN) {
03141                 valid |= DOIV_DRYRUN;
03142                 if (start->ls_flags & LPF_DRYRUN)
03143                         flags |= DOIF_DRYRUN;
03144         }
03145 
03146         if (!list_empty(&lfsck->li_list_scan))
03147                 flags |= DOIF_OUTUSED;
03148 
03149         lfsck->li_args_oit = (flags << DT_OTABLE_IT_FLAGS_SHIFT) | valid;
03150         thread_set_flags(thread, 0);
03151         lta = lfsck_thread_args_init(lfsck, NULL, lsp);
03152         if (IS_ERR(lta))
03153                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(lta));
03154 
03155         __lfsck_set_speed(lfsck, bk->lb_speed_limit);
03156         task = kthread_run(lfsck_master_engine, lta, "lfsck");
03157         if (IS_ERR(task)) {
03158                 rc = PTR_ERR(task);
03159                 CERROR("%s: cannot start LFSCK thread: rc = %d\n",
03160                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), rc);
03161                 lfsck_thread_args_fini(lta);
03162 
03163                 GOTO(out, rc);
03164         }
03165 
03166         l_wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq,
03167                      thread_is_running(thread) ||
03168                      thread_is_stopped(thread),
03169                      &lwi);
03170         if (start == NULL || !(start->ls_flags & LPF_BROADCAST)) {
03171                 lfsck->li_start_unplug = 1;
03172                 wake_up_all(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
03173 
03174                 GOTO(out, rc = 0);
03175         }
03176 
03177         /* release lfsck::li_mutex to avoid deadlock. */
03178         mutex_unlock(&lfsck->li_mutex);
03179         rc = lfsck_start_all(env, lfsck, start);
03180         if (rc != 0) {
03181                 spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
03182                 if (thread_is_stopped(thread)) {
03183                         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
03184                 } else {
03185                         lfsck->li_status = LS_FAILED;
03186                         lfsck->li_flags = 0;
03187                         thread_set_flags(thread, SVC_STOPPING);
03188                         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
03189 
03190                         lfsck->li_start_unplug = 1;
03191                         wake_up_all(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
03192                         l_wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq,
03193                                      thread_is_stopped(thread),
03194                                      &lwi);
03195                 }
03196         } else {
03197                 lfsck->li_start_unplug = 1;
03198                 wake_up_all(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
03199         }
03200 
03201         GOTO(put, rc);
03202 
03203 out:
03204         mutex_unlock(&lfsck->li_mutex);
03205 
03206 put:
03207         lfsck_instance_put(env, lfsck);
03208 
03209         return rc < 0 ? rc : 0;
03210 }
03211 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lfsck_start);
03212 
03213 int lfsck_stop(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key,
03214                struct lfsck_stop *stop)
03215 {
03216         struct lfsck_instance   *lfsck;
03217         struct ptlrpc_thread    *thread;
03218         struct l_wait_info       lwi    = { 0 };
03219         int                      rc     = 0;
03220         int                      rc1    = 0;
03221         ENTRY;
03222 
03223         lfsck = lfsck_instance_find(key, true, false);
03224         if (unlikely(lfsck == NULL))
03225                 RETURN(-ENXIO);
03226 
03227         thread = &lfsck->li_thread;
03228         /* release lfsck::li_mutex to avoid deadlock. */
03229         if (stop != NULL && stop->ls_flags & LPF_BROADCAST) {
03230                 if (!lfsck->li_master) {
03231                         CERROR("%s: only allow to specify '-A' via MDS\n",
03232                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck));
03233 
03234                         GOTO(out, rc = -EPERM);
03235                 }
03236 
03237                 rc1 = lfsck_stop_all(env, lfsck, stop);
03238         }
03239 
03240         mutex_lock(&lfsck->li_mutex);
03241         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
03242         /* no error if LFSCK is already stopped, or was never started */
03243         if (thread_is_init(thread) || thread_is_stopped(thread)) {
03244                 spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
03245                 GOTO(out, rc = 0);
03246         }
03247 
03248         if (stop != NULL) {
03249                 lfsck->li_status = stop->ls_status;
03250                 lfsck->li_flags = stop->ls_flags;
03251         } else {
03252                 lfsck->li_status = LS_STOPPED;
03253                 lfsck->li_flags = 0;
03254         }
03255 
03256         thread_set_flags(thread, SVC_STOPPING);
03257 
03258         if (lfsck->li_master) {
03259                 struct lfsck_component *com;
03260                 struct lfsck_assistant_data *lad;
03261 
03262                 list_for_each_entry(com, &lfsck->li_list_scan, lc_link) {
03263                         lad = com->lc_data;
03264                         spin_lock(&lad->lad_lock);
03265                         if (lad->lad_task != NULL)
03266                                 force_sig(SIGINT, lad->lad_task);
03267                         spin_unlock(&lad->lad_lock);
03268                 }
03269 
03270                 list_for_each_entry(com, &lfsck->li_list_double_scan, lc_link) {
03271                         lad = com->lc_data;
03272                         spin_lock(&lad->lad_lock);
03273                         if (lad->lad_task != NULL)
03274                                 force_sig(SIGINT, lad->lad_task);
03275                         spin_unlock(&lad->lad_lock);
03276                 }
03277         }
03278 
03279         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
03280 
03281         wake_up_all(&thread->t_ctl_waitq);
03282         l_wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq,
03283                      thread_is_stopped(thread),
03284                      &lwi);
03285 
03286         GOTO(out, rc = 0);
03287 
03288 out:
03289         mutex_unlock(&lfsck->li_mutex);
03290         lfsck_instance_put(env, lfsck);
03291 
03292         return rc != 0 ? rc : rc1;
03293 }
03294 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lfsck_stop);
03295 
03296 int lfsck_in_notify(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key,
03297                     struct lfsck_request *lr, struct thandle *th)
03298 {
03299         int rc = -EOPNOTSUPP;
03300         ENTRY;
03301 
03302         switch (lr->lr_event) {
03303         case LE_START: {
03304                 struct lfsck_start       *start = &lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_start;
03305                 struct lfsck_start_param  lsp;
03306 
03307                 memset(start, 0, sizeof(*start));
03308                 start->ls_valid = lr->lr_valid;
03309                 start->ls_speed_limit = lr->lr_speed;
03310                 start->ls_version = lr->lr_version;
03311                 start->ls_active = lr->lr_active;
03312                 start->ls_flags = lr->lr_param & ~LPF_BROADCAST;
03313                 start->ls_async_windows = lr->lr_async_windows;
03314 
03315                 lsp.lsp_start = start;
03316                 lsp.lsp_index = lr->lr_index;
03317                 lsp.lsp_index_valid = 1;
03318                 rc = lfsck_start(env, key, &lsp);
03319                 break;
03320         }
03321         case LE_STOP: {
03322                 struct lfsck_stop *stop = &lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_stop;
03323 
03324                 memset(stop, 0, sizeof(*stop));
03325                 stop->ls_status = lr->lr_status;
03326                 stop->ls_flags = lr->lr_param & ~LPF_BROADCAST;
03327                 rc = lfsck_stop(env, key, stop);
03328                 break;
03329         }
03330         case LE_PHASE1_DONE:
03331         case LE_PHASE2_DONE:
03332         case LE_FID_ACCESSED:
03333         case LE_PEER_EXIT:
03334         case LE_CONDITIONAL_DESTROY:
03335         case LE_SKIP_NLINK_DECLARE:
03336         case LE_SKIP_NLINK:
03337         case LE_SET_LMV_MASTER:
03338         case LE_SET_LMV_SLAVE:
03339         case LE_PAIRS_VERIFY: {
03340                 struct lfsck_instance  *lfsck;
03341                 struct lfsck_component *com;
03342 
03343                 lfsck = lfsck_instance_find(key, true, false);
03344                 if (unlikely(lfsck == NULL))
03345                         RETURN(-ENXIO);
03346 
03347                 com = lfsck_component_find(lfsck, lr->lr_active);
03348                 if (likely(com != NULL)) {
03349                         rc = com->lc_ops->lfsck_in_notify(env, com, lr, th);
03350                         lfsck_component_put(env, com);
03351                 }
03352 
03353                 lfsck_instance_put(env, lfsck);
03354                 break;
03355         }
03356         default:
03357                 break;
03358         }
03359 
03360         RETURN(rc);
03361 }
03362 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lfsck_in_notify);
03363 
03364 int lfsck_query(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key,
03365                 struct lfsck_request *req, struct lfsck_reply *rep,
03366                 struct lfsck_query *que)
03367 {
03368         struct lfsck_instance  *lfsck;
03369         struct lfsck_component *com;
03370         int                     i;
03371         int                     rc = 0;
03372         __u16                   type;
03373         ENTRY;
03374 
03375         lfsck = lfsck_instance_find(key, true, false);
03376         if (unlikely(lfsck == NULL))
03377                 RETURN(-ENXIO);
03378 
03379         if (que != NULL) {
03380                 if (que->lu_types == LFSCK_TYPES_ALL)
03381                         que->lu_types =
03382                                 LFSCK_TYPES_SUPPORTED & ~LFSCK_TYPE_SCRUB;
03383 
03384                 if (que->lu_types & ~LFSCK_TYPES_SUPPORTED) {
03385                         que->lu_types &= ~LFSCK_TYPES_SUPPORTED;
03386 
03387                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOTSUPP);
03388                 }
03389 
03390                 for (i = 0, type = 1 << i; i < LFSCK_TYPE_BITS;
03391                      i++, type = 1 << i) {
03392                         if (!(que->lu_types & type))
03393                                 continue;
03394 
03395 again:
03396                         com = lfsck_component_find(lfsck, type);
03397                         if (unlikely(com == NULL))
03398                                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOTSUPP);
03399 
03400                         memset(que->lu_mdts_count[i], 0,
03401                                sizeof(__u32) * (LS_MAX + 1));
03402                         memset(que->lu_osts_count[i], 0,
03403                                sizeof(__u32) * (LS_MAX + 1));
03404                         que->lu_repaired[i] = 0;
03405                         rc = com->lc_ops->lfsck_query(env, com, req, rep,
03406                                                       que, i);
03407                         lfsck_component_put(env, com);
03408                         if  (rc < 0)
03409                                 GOTO(out, rc);
03410                 }
03411 
03412                 if (!(que->lu_flags & LPF_WAIT))
03413                         GOTO(out, rc);
03414 
03415                 for (i = 0, type = 1 << i; i < LFSCK_TYPE_BITS;
03416                      i++, type = 1 << i) {
03417                         if (!(que->lu_types & type))
03418                                 continue;
03419 
03420                         if (que->lu_mdts_count[i][LS_SCANNING_PHASE1] != 0 ||
03421                             que->lu_mdts_count[i][LS_SCANNING_PHASE2] != 0 ||
03422                             que->lu_osts_count[i][LS_SCANNING_PHASE1] != 0 ||
03423                             que->lu_osts_count[i][LS_SCANNING_PHASE2] != 0) {
03424                                 struct l_wait_info lwi;
03425 
03426                                 /* If it is required to wait, then sleep
03427                                  * 3 seconds and try to query again. */
03428                                 lwi = LWI_TIMEOUT_INTR(cfs_time_seconds(3),
03429                                                        NULL,
03430                                                        LWI_ON_SIGNAL_NOOP,
03431                                                        NULL);
03432                                 rc = l_wait_event(lfsck->li_thread.t_ctl_waitq,
03433                                                   0, &lwi);
03434                                 if (rc == -ETIMEDOUT)
03435                                         goto again;
03436                         }
03437                 }
03438         } else {
03439                 com = lfsck_component_find(lfsck, req->lr_active);
03440                 if (likely(com != NULL)) {
03441                         rc = com->lc_ops->lfsck_query(env, com, req, rep,
03442                                                       que, -1);
03443                         lfsck_component_put(env, com);
03444                 } else {
03445                         rc = -ENOTSUPP;
03446                 }
03447         }
03448 
03449         GOTO(out, rc);
03450 
03451 out:
03452         lfsck_instance_put(env, lfsck);
03453         return rc;
03454 }
03455 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lfsck_query);
03456 
03457 int lfsck_register_namespace(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key,
03458                              struct ldlm_namespace *ns)
03459 {
03460         struct lfsck_instance  *lfsck;
03461         int                     rc      = -ENXIO;
03462 
03463         lfsck = lfsck_instance_find(key, true, false);
03464         if (likely(lfsck != NULL)) {
03465                 lfsck->li_namespace = ns;
03466                 lfsck_instance_put(env, lfsck);
03467                 rc = 0;
03468         }
03469 
03470         return rc;
03471 }
03472 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lfsck_register_namespace);
03473 
03474 int lfsck_register(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key,
03475                    struct dt_device *next, struct obd_device *obd,
03476                    lfsck_out_notify notify, void *notify_data, bool master)
03477 {
03478         struct lfsck_instance   *lfsck;
03479         struct dt_object        *root  = NULL;
03480         struct dt_object        *obj   = NULL;
03481         struct lu_fid           *fid   = &lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_fid;
03482         int                      rc;
03483         ENTRY;
03484 
03485         lfsck = lfsck_instance_find(key, false, false);
03486         if (unlikely(lfsck != NULL))
03487                 RETURN(-EEXIST);
03488 
03489         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(lfsck);
03490         if (lfsck == NULL)
03491                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
03492 
03493         mutex_init(&lfsck->li_mutex);
03494         spin_lock_init(&lfsck->li_lock);
03495         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lfsck->li_link);
03496         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lfsck->li_list_scan);
03497         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lfsck->li_list_dir);
03498         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lfsck->li_list_double_scan);
03499         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lfsck->li_list_idle);
03500         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lfsck->li_list_lmv);
03501         atomic_set(&lfsck->li_ref, 1);
03502         atomic_set(&lfsck->li_double_scan_count, 0);
03503         init_waitqueue_head(&lfsck->li_thread.t_ctl_waitq);
03504         lfsck->li_out_notify = notify;
03505         lfsck->li_out_notify_data = notify_data;
03506         lfsck->li_next = next;
03507         lfsck->li_bottom = key;
03508         lfsck->li_obd = obd;
03509 
03510         rc = lfsck_tgt_descs_init(&lfsck->li_ost_descs);
03511         if (rc != 0)
03512                 GOTO(out, rc);
03513 
03514         rc = lfsck_tgt_descs_init(&lfsck->li_mdt_descs);
03515         if (rc != 0)
03516                 GOTO(out, rc);
03517 
03518         fid->f_seq = FID_SEQ_LOCAL_NAME;
03519         fid->f_oid = 1;
03520         fid->f_ver = 0;
03521         rc = local_oid_storage_init(env, key, fid, &lfsck->li_los);
03522         if (rc != 0)
03523                 GOTO(out, rc);
03524 
03525         rc = dt_root_get(env, key, fid);
03526         if (rc != 0)
03527                 GOTO(out, rc);
03528 
03529         root = dt_locate(env, key, fid);
03530         if (IS_ERR(root))
03531                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(root));
03532 
03533         if (unlikely(!dt_try_as_dir(env, root)))
03534                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOTDIR);
03535 
03536         lfsck->li_local_root_fid = *fid;
03537         if (master) {
03538                 lfsck->li_master = 1;
03539                 if (lfsck_dev_idx(lfsck) == 0) {
03540                         struct lu_fid *pfid = &lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_fid2;
03541                         const struct lu_name *cname;
03542 
03543                         rc = dt_lookup(env, root,
03544                                 (struct dt_rec *)(&lfsck->li_global_root_fid),
03545                                 (const struct dt_key *)"ROOT");
03546                         if (rc != 0)
03547                                 GOTO(out, rc);
03548 
03549                         obj = dt_locate(env, key, &lfsck->li_global_root_fid);
03550                         if (IS_ERR(obj))
03551                                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(obj));
03552 
03553                         if (unlikely(!dt_try_as_dir(env, obj)))
03554                                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOTDIR);
03555 
03556                         rc = dt_lookup(env, obj, (struct dt_rec *)fid,
03557                                 (const struct dt_key *)dotlustre);
03558                         if (rc != 0)
03559                                 GOTO(out, rc);
03560 
03561                         lfsck_object_put(env, obj);
03562                         obj = dt_locate(env, key, fid);
03563                         if (IS_ERR(obj))
03564                                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(obj));
03565 
03566                         cname = lfsck_name_get_const(env, dotlustre,
03567                                                      strlen(dotlustre));
03568                         rc = lfsck_verify_linkea(env, obj, cname,
03569                                                  &lfsck->li_global_root_fid);
03570                         if (rc != 0)
03571                                 GOTO(out, rc);
03572 
03573                         if (unlikely(!dt_try_as_dir(env, obj)))
03574                                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOTDIR);
03575 
03576                         *pfid = *fid;
03577                         rc = dt_lookup(env, obj, (struct dt_rec *)fid,
03578                                        (const struct dt_key *)lostfound);
03579                         if (rc != 0)
03580                                 GOTO(out, rc);
03581 
03582                         lfsck_object_put(env, obj);
03583                         obj = dt_locate(env, key, fid);
03584                         if (IS_ERR(obj))
03585                                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(obj));
03586 
03587                         cname = lfsck_name_get_const(env, lostfound,
03588                                                      strlen(lostfound));
03589                         rc = lfsck_verify_linkea(env, obj, cname, pfid);
03590                         if (rc != 0)
03591                                 GOTO(out, rc);
03592 
03593                         lfsck_object_put(env, obj);
03594                         obj = NULL;
03595                 }
03596         }
03597 
03598         fid->f_seq = FID_SEQ_LOCAL_FILE;
03599         fid->f_oid = OTABLE_IT_OID;
03600         fid->f_ver = 0;
03601         obj = dt_locate(env, key, fid);
03602         if (IS_ERR(obj))
03603                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(obj));
03604 
03605         rc = obj->do_ops->do_index_try(env, obj, &dt_otable_features);
03606         if (rc != 0)
03607                 GOTO(out, rc);
03608 
03609         lfsck->li_obj_oit = obj;
03610         obj = local_file_find_or_create(env, lfsck->li_los, root, LFSCK_DIR,
03611                                         S_IFDIR | S_IRUGO | S_IWUSR);
03612         if (IS_ERR(obj))
03613                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(obj));
03614 
03615         lu_object_get(&obj->do_lu);
03616         lfsck->li_lfsck_dir = obj;
03617         rc = lfsck_bookmark_setup(env, lfsck);
03618         if (rc != 0)
03619                 GOTO(out, rc);
03620 
03621         if (master) {
03622                 rc = lfsck_fid_init(lfsck);
03623                 if (rc < 0)
03624                         GOTO(out, rc);
03625 
03626                 rc = lfsck_namespace_setup(env, lfsck);
03627                 if (rc < 0)
03628                         GOTO(out, rc);
03629         }
03630 
03631         rc = lfsck_layout_setup(env, lfsck);
03632         if (rc < 0)
03633                 GOTO(out, rc);
03634 
03635         /* XXX: more LFSCK components initialization to be added here. */
03636 
03637         rc = lfsck_instance_add(lfsck);
03638         if (rc == 0)
03639                 rc = lfsck_add_target_from_orphan(env, lfsck);
03640 out:
03641         if (obj != NULL && !IS_ERR(obj))
03642                 lfsck_object_put(env, obj);
03643         if (root != NULL && !IS_ERR(root))
03644                 lfsck_object_put(env, root);
03645         if (rc != 0)
03646                 lfsck_instance_cleanup(env, lfsck);
03647         return rc;
03648 }
03649 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lfsck_register);
03650 
03651 void lfsck_degister(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key)
03652 {
03653         struct lfsck_instance *lfsck;
03654 
03655         lfsck = lfsck_instance_find(key, false, true);
03656         if (lfsck != NULL)
03657                 lfsck_instance_put(env, lfsck);
03658 }
03659 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lfsck_degister);
03660 
03661 int lfsck_add_target(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key,
03662                      struct dt_device *tgt, struct obd_export *exp,
03663                      __u32 index, bool for_ost)
03664 {
03665         struct lfsck_instance   *lfsck;
03666         struct lfsck_tgt_desc   *ltd;
03667         int                      rc;
03668         ENTRY;
03669 
03670         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(ltd);
03671         if (ltd == NULL)
03672                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
03673 
03674         ltd->ltd_tgt = tgt;
03675         ltd->ltd_key = key;
03676         ltd->ltd_exp = exp;
03677         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ltd->ltd_orphan_list);
03678         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ltd->ltd_layout_list);
03679         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list);
03680         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ltd->ltd_namespace_list);
03681         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ltd->ltd_namespace_phase_list);
03682         atomic_set(&ltd->ltd_ref, 1);
03683         ltd->ltd_index = index;
03684 
03685         spin_lock(&lfsck_instance_lock);
03686         lfsck = __lfsck_instance_find(key, true, false);
03687         if (lfsck == NULL) {
03688                 if (for_ost)
03689                         list_add_tail(&ltd->ltd_orphan_list,
03690                                       &lfsck_ost_orphan_list);
03691                 else
03692                         list_add_tail(&ltd->ltd_orphan_list,
03693                                       &lfsck_mdt_orphan_list);
03694                 spin_unlock(&lfsck_instance_lock);
03695 
03696                 RETURN(0);
03697         }
03698         spin_unlock(&lfsck_instance_lock);
03699 
03700         rc = __lfsck_add_target(env, lfsck, ltd, for_ost, false);
03701         if (rc != 0)
03702                 lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
03703 
03704         lfsck_instance_put(env, lfsck);
03705 
03706         RETURN(rc);
03707 }
03708 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lfsck_add_target);
03709 
03710 void lfsck_del_target(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key,
03711                       struct dt_device *tgt, __u32 index, bool for_ost)
03712 {
03713         struct lfsck_instance   *lfsck;
03714         struct lfsck_tgt_descs  *ltds;
03715         struct lfsck_tgt_desc   *ltd;
03716         struct list_head        *head;
03717 
03718         if (for_ost)
03719                 head = &lfsck_ost_orphan_list;
03720         else
03721                 head = &lfsck_mdt_orphan_list;
03722 
03723         spin_lock(&lfsck_instance_lock);
03724         list_for_each_entry(ltd, head, ltd_orphan_list) {
03725                 if (ltd->ltd_tgt == tgt) {
03726                         list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_orphan_list);
03727                         spin_unlock(&lfsck_instance_lock);
03728                         lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
03729 
03730                         return;
03731                 }
03732         }
03733 
03734         ltd = NULL;
03735         lfsck = __lfsck_instance_find(key, true, false);
03736         spin_unlock(&lfsck_instance_lock);
03737         if (unlikely(lfsck == NULL))
03738                 return;
03739 
03740         if (for_ost)
03741                 ltds = &lfsck->li_ost_descs;
03742         else
03743                 ltds = &lfsck->li_mdt_descs;
03744 
03745         down_write(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
03746         LASSERT(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap != NULL);
03747 
03748         if (unlikely(index >= ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap->size))
03749                 goto unlock;
03750 
03751         ltd = lfsck_ltd2tgt(ltds, index);
03752         if (unlikely(ltd == NULL))
03753                 goto unlock;
03754 
03755         LASSERT(ltds->ltd_tgtnr > 0);
03756 
03757         ltds->ltd_tgtnr--;
03758         cfs_bitmap_clear(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap, index);
03759         lfsck_assign_tgt(ltds, NULL, index);
03760 
03761 unlock:
03762         if (ltd == NULL) {
03763                 if (for_ost)
03764                         head = &lfsck->li_ost_descs.ltd_orphan;
03765                 else
03766                         head = &lfsck->li_mdt_descs.ltd_orphan;
03767 
03768                 list_for_each_entry(ltd, head, ltd_orphan_list) {
03769                         if (ltd->ltd_tgt == tgt) {
03770                                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_orphan_list);
03771                                 break;
03772                         }
03773                 }
03774         }
03775 
03776         up_write(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
03777         if (ltd != NULL) {
03778                 spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
03779                 ltd->ltd_dead = 1;
03780                 spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
03781                 lfsck_stop_notify(env, lfsck, ltds, ltd, LFSCK_TYPE_NAMESPACE);
03782                 lfsck_stop_notify(env, lfsck, ltds, ltd, LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT);
03783                 lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
03784         }
03785 
03786         lfsck_instance_put(env, lfsck);
03787 }
03788 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lfsck_del_target);
03789 
03790 static int __init lfsck_init(void)
03791 {
03792         int rc;
03793 
03794         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lfsck_instance_list);
03795         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lfsck_ost_orphan_list);
03796         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lfsck_mdt_orphan_list);
03797         lfsck_key_init_generic(&lfsck_thread_key, NULL);
03798         rc = lu_context_key_register(&lfsck_thread_key);
03799         if (rc == 0) {
03800                 tgt_register_lfsck_in_notify(lfsck_in_notify);
03801                 tgt_register_lfsck_query(lfsck_query);
03802         }
03803 
03804         return rc;
03805 }
03806 
03807 static void __exit lfsck_exit(void)
03808 {
03809         struct lfsck_tgt_desc *ltd;
03810         struct lfsck_tgt_desc *next;
03811 
03812         LASSERT(list_empty(&lfsck_instance_list));
03813 
03814         list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next, &lfsck_ost_orphan_list,
03815                                  ltd_orphan_list) {
03816                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_orphan_list);
03817                 lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
03818         }
03819 
03820         list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next, &lfsck_mdt_orphan_list,
03821                                  ltd_orphan_list) {
03822                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_orphan_list);
03823                 lfsck_tgt_put(ltd);
03824         }
03825 
03826         lu_context_key_degister(&lfsck_thread_key);
03827 }
03828 
03829 MODULE_AUTHOR("OpenSFS, Inc. <http://www.lustre.org/>");
03830 MODULE_DESCRIPTION("Lustre File System Checker");
03831 MODULE_VERSION(LUSTRE_VERSION_STRING);
03832 MODULE_LICENSE("GPL");
03833 
03834 module_init(lfsck_init);
03835 module_exit(lfsck_exit);
